Ms. Wassa (the second woman from the right in the photo) is one of the fabric and pagne retailers in the group. She intends to use her loan to buy ten sets of pagnes. She gets her supplies on the spot from wholesalers and sells her goods at retail, in cash and on credit, at home and at the market, to a clientele composed essentially of women. With this loan, Ms. Wassa intends to realize an average monthly profit of 20,000 FCFA, which will be used to reinvest in her business and to take care of certain household needs.

loans.use: To buy pagnes (a type of brightly-printed West African clothing)

loans.name: Bernarda De Jesús

texts.es: Bernarda de Jesús habita junto con su esposo e hijos en casa de su propiedad. Ella es una mujer muy trabajadora y humilde. La señora Bernarda se dedica junto a la ayuda de su esposo al cultivo de los principales granos básicos como: maíz y frijoles.  Ha trabajado toda su vida para sacar adelante a su querida familia y gracias a su trabajo y a la ayuda de Dios ha logrado llevar el pan de cada día a su hogar y ayudar un poco con los gastos del hogar. Vive en condiciones muy pobres y humildes ya que no cuentan con la entrada de otros ingresos.  A pesar de todo ella no se da por vencida, esto la impulsa a trabajar más duro para sacar adelante a su familia que lo es todo para ella. Gracias a su carisma y generosidad ha sabido ganarse la confianza de muchos de sus vecinos los cuales cada día la prefieren más por ser una mujer muy trabajadora y honesta. Ha tomado la decisión de solicitar este credito a INTEGRAL para invertir en los insumos agrícolas para la siembra 2012 que se aproxima una vez ingrese el invierno (semillas, abonos, insecticidas, etc.) para el cultivo de los principales granos básicos. De esta forma espera lograr mejorar las condiciones de su familia y continuar dando lo que se merecen.
texts.en:
Bernarda de Jesús lives with her husband and children in her own house.  She is a very hard-working and humble woman.

Bernarda devotes herself, with help from her husband, to growing the main staple crops like corn and beans.  She has worked her whole life in order to get her beloved family ahead.  Thanks to her work and God’s help, she has managed to bring home the daily bread.  She also helps a little with the household expenses.

She lives in very poor and humble conditions because she does not have access to other income.  In spite of everything, she does not give up.  This drives her to work harder to get her family ahead.  Her family is everything to her.

Thanks to her charisma and generosity she has known how to win the confidence of a lot of her neighbors.  Each day more people prefer her business because she is a very hard-working and honest woman.

She has made the decision to request a loan from Integral.  The loan is to buy agricultural supplies for the 2012 sowing time that is approaching once winter comes.  She will buy seeds, fertilizers, and insecticides for her main crops of staples.  This way she hopes to manage to improve her family’s living conditions and to continue giving them what they deserve.

loans.use: to buy seeds, fertilizers, and insecticides.

loans.name: Sindy Mariela

texts.es: Sindy Mariela de 24 años de edad,  habita junto con sus tres hijos los cuales se encuentran estudiando. Ella se dedica  a la venta de ropa para todas las edades gustos y preferencias. Posee un puesto en zona muy estrategica en el cual ofrece sus productos  a muy buenos precios. Ella tiene muchos sueños,  en especial dar a sus hijos la mejor educación, es decir, apoyarlos hasta que ellos puedan tener una profesión y puedan valerse por sí mismos. Para esto necesita trabajar muy duro ya que es la única forma que conoce para salir adelante. Ha tomado la decisión de solicitar este crédito a INTEGRAL para invertir en su negocio en la compra de variedad de prendas de vestir (faldas, pantalones, short, ropa interior, etc.) para cubrir una mayor demanda que le permita mejorar sus ventas e ingresos. De esta forma espera que su sueño de obtener una mejor vida ya no de sólo subsistencia para su familia se cumpla.
texts.en:
Sindy Mariela, 24, lives with her three children who are attending school.  She sells clothes for all ages, tastes and preferences.  She has a stand in a very strategic spot where she sells her items at very good prices.  She has many dreams especially to provide the best education for her children, that is, support them until they can have professions and can look after themselves.  To do so, she needs to work very hard since this is the only way she knows of to get ahead.

She’s decided to request this loan from INTEGRAL to invest in her business buying an assortment of clothes (skirts, pants, shorts, underwear, etc.)  to cover a larger demand so that she can increase sales and income.  In this way, she hopes that her dream of attaining a better life for her family, not just one of subsistence, will become a reality.

loans.use: to buy clothes.

loans.name: José Roberto

texts.es: José Roberto de 44 años de edad, habita en casa de su propiedad junto con su compañera de vida y su querida hija. El  se dedica al comercio de repuestos de bicicletas desde hace muchos años. Ha trabajado toda su vida para sacar adelante a su querida familia la cual es su principal fuente de inspiración. Para él lo más importante es que su familia este bien y tenga todo lo necesario para sobrevivir, es por eso que día con día se levanta muy temprano para atender su negocio y poder llevar el pan de cada día a su hogar. Su sueño es mantener su negocio activo por mucho más tiempo ya que este es su principal fuente de ingresos. Es un hombre muy trabajador y responsable el cual gracias a su carisma ha sabido ganarse la confianza de sus clientes. Ha tomado la  decisión de solicitar este crédito a INTEGRAL para invertir en su negocio en la compra de pintura y llantas para bicicletas ya que es  lo que más se vende y quiere aprovechar esta temporada de vacaciones que normalmente es muy buena para el comercio. Confía en Dios plenamente que obtendrá resultados favorables y logrará el sueño de dar a su familia mejores condiciones de vida
texts.en:
Forty-four year old José Roberto lives in his own home with his life companion and his lovely daughter. For many years, he has made a living selling bike parts. He has worked all his life to help his family get ahead, which is the main source of his motivation. For him, the most important thing is that his family is okay and that they have everything they need to survive. This is why he wakes up very early everyday to attend to his business and to be able to bring bread home each day. 

His dream is to keep his business active for a long time, since it is his main source of income. He is a very hardworking and responsible man who has been able to gain the confidence of his customers with his charisma. 

He has decided to ask for this loan from INTEGRAL to put towards the purchase of paint and tires for bicycles for his business, since those are what sell the most, and he wants to take advantage of this vacation season, which is usually very good for business. He puts his full faith in God to give him favorable results and to let him achieve his dream of giving his family a better standard of living.

loans.use: to purchase paint and tires for bicycles.

loans.name: Peter

texts.en: Peter is a married man. He has 2 children with ages ranging from 5 years to 9 years. He describes himself as ambitious. He operates a general store and also farms.  He sells home products such as sugar, salt, flour and bread, and he also sells goats. He has been involved in this business for 2 years. His business is located in a conducive business environment and his primary customers are local residents. He describes his biggest business challenge to be the high prices of home products. Peter plans to use the KES 20,000 loan to buy more home products. Peter's dream and business goal is to venture into the transportation services business.

loans.use: to buy home products to sell.

loans.name: Daniel

texts.en: Patrick  is a married man. He has 2 children with ages ranging from 5 years to 9 years. He describes himself as ambitious. He operates a retail store where he sells home products such as flour, salt, sugar and bread. He has been involved in this business for 2 years. His business is located in a conducive business environment and his primary customers are local residents. He describes his biggest business challenge as stiff competition within the area. He will use the KES 10,000 loan to buy more home products. His business goal is to venture into the transportation industry business within 5 years.

loans.use: to buy more home products.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: To purchase desks, text books, and other teaching aids.

loans.name: Badenya Group

texts.fr:
Constitué de 3 mariées et de 2 célibataires, les membres de groupe Badenya vivent majoritairement dans des familles traditionnelles avec une moyenne d’âge de 28 ans et  2 enfants. Elles habitent toutes dans la ville de Sikasso (3ème Région administrative du Mali) et se sont connues à travers des liens de parenté, de voisinage et de mariage. Les membres du groupe font le petit commerce, de tissus et pagnes, de gingembre, de riz et des assiettes. Dans le but d’augmenter leurs fonds de commerce, les membres du groupe intègrent Soro Yiriwaso et sont à leur 1ème cycle de prêt solidaire.
Madame Ami (première femme de la droite vers la gauche sur la photo) est l’une des vendeuses de tissus et pagnes du groupe. Elle compte utiliser son prêt pour acheter 10 pièces de pagnes. Elle s’approvisionne sur place auprès des grossistes et effectue ses  ventes en détail, au comptant et à crédit, à domicile et au marché, à une clientèle composée essentiellement de femmes. Madame Ami compte réaliser avec ce prêt un bénéfice mensuel moyen de 20.000 FCFA qui sera utilisé, pour être réinvesti dans l’activité et prendre en charge  certains besoins du foyer.
texts.en:
Comprising three married and two unmarried women, the members of the Badenya group mostly live in traditional households and are on average 28 years old with two children. They all live in the city of Sikasso (3rd administrative region of Mali) and know each other through familial, neighbourhood, and marital relations. The group members run small businesses selling fabric, pagnes (a type of brightly-printed West African clothing), ginger, rice, and plates. With the goal of increasing their capital, the group members joined Soro Yiriwaso and are on their first solidarity (group) loan cycle.
Ms. Ami (the woman all the way on the right in the photo) is one of the fabric and pagne retailers in the group. She intends to use her loan to buy ten sets of pagnes. She gets her supplies on the spot from wholesalers and sells her goods at retail, in cash and on credit, at home and at the market, to a clientele composed essentially of women. With this loan, Ms. Wassa intends to realize an average monthly profit of 20,000 FCFA, which will be used to reinvest in her business and to take care of certain household needs.

loans.use: To buy pagnes (a type of brightly-printed West African clothing)

loans.name: Rosibel

texts.es: Rosibel de 30 años de edad, habita junto a sus padres e hijos. Ella se dedica al comercio de tamales de elote. Su negocio lo tiene dentro de su hogar de habitación. Tiene muchos años de dedicarse a esta actividad por lo que ya cuenta con mucho reconocimiento y experiencia. Gracias a su carisma y dedicación en el trabajo ha sabido ganarse la confianza de sus clientes los cuales cada día la prefieren más por ser una mujer emprendedora, higiénica, responsable y trabajadora. Para ella es muy importante que sus clientes estén satisfechos con el servicio que ella ofrece por  lo que está muy pendiente de dar lo mejor en su trabajo.  Ha estado pensando mucho en la forma de hacer crecer su negocio y ha tomado la decisión de invertir en su negocio en la compra de la materia prima necesaria para preparar los ricos tamales y así poder cubrir una mayor demanda de mercado que le permita mejorar sus condiciones de vida. Es por esa razón que solicita este crédito a INTEGRAL para  comprar insumos como: elotes, leche, margarina derretida, azúcar, sal, leña, etc. de tal forma que con esto pueda tener acceso a mejores ingresos que le permitan mejorar su calidad de vida y la de su familia.
texts.en:
Rosibel, 30, lives with her parents and her children. She sells corn tamales.  Her business is located at home.  She’s been in this line of work for many years so she’s very well-known and has much experience.  Thanks to her charisma and dedication to work she’s won over the trust of her customers who prefer her more each day because she’s an enterprising, hygienic, responsible and hardworking woman.  For her, it’s important that her customers are satisfied with the service she offers which is why she’s always focused on putting the very best into her work.

She’s been thinking a lot about ways of making her business grow and she’s made the decision to invest in the business buying raw materials needed to make her delicious tamales to satisfy a larger market demand thus being able to improve her living conditions.  Because of this, she’s asking INTEGRAL for a loan to buy ingredients like: corn on the cob, milk, melted margarine, sugar, salt, firewood, etc. so that she can attain better income that will allow for improved quality of life for her and her family.

loans.use: to buy corn on the cob,milk, melted margarine, sugar, salt and firewood.

loans.name: Sandra Aracely

texts.es: Sandra Aracely  es una mujer que se caracteriza principalmente por ser emprendedora, carismática y responsable. Ella se dedica al comercio de tortilla y tamales de gallina y pollo desde hace mucho tiempo. Cuenta con mucha experiencia por lo que ya posee algunos clientes fijos que cada día la prefieren mas por el buen servicio y por las deliciosas tortillas y tamales que ofrece. Gracias a su arduo trabajo ha sabido mantener a flote su negocio pese  a la gran cantidad de competencia.  Su deseo es seguir manteniendo activo su negocio ya que es su principal fuente de ingresos desde hace muchos años. Como toda mujer emprendedora ha tomado la decisión de invertir en su negocio con el fin de poder cubrir una mayor demanda de mercado en especial en esta temporada de vacaciones que se acerca ya que estas fechas son muy favorables para los negocios, al permanecer sus vecinos descansando en casa, por lo que no quiere dejar pasar esta oportunidad. Por lo anterior ha tomado la decisión de solicitar este crédito a INTEGRAL para poder comprar los insumos necesarios como: maíz, cal, leña, sal, pollos, verduras, etc. para preparar las ricas tortillas y tamales que con mucho amor prepara día con día. De esta forma espera ganarse el pan de cada día y poder accesar a mejores oportunidades de vida.
texts.en:
Sandra Aracely is a woman noted primarily for being enterprising, charismatic and responsible.  She has sold tortillas and chicken tamales for a long time.  She has much experience so she has many regular customers who prefer her every day because of the good service and for the delicious tortillas and tamales she sells.  Thanks to her hard work she’s managed to keep the business afloat despite the large amount of competition.  Her wish is to continue in operation since it’s been her main source of income for many years.

Like all enterprising women she’s made the decision to invest in her business in order to cover a larger market demand especially during the vacation season that’s approaching since this season is very favorable for  businesses since neighbors will be staying home to rest and she does not want to miss out on this opportunity.

Because of the above, she’s decided to ask INTEGRAL for this loan to buy needed ingredients and supplies: corn, lime powder, firewood, salt, chickens, vegetables, etc. to prepare the delicious tortillas and tamales that she prepares every day with much love. She hopes this way to earn her daily bread and to have access to better life opportunities.

loans.use: to buy corn, lime powder, salt, firewood, chickens, vegetables, etc.

loans.name: Dlnya's Group

texts.en:
Dlnya is a 30-year-old Iraqi woman, and a mother of two children. As a young mother and wife, working from home, she has been using her sewing skills for the past 5 years to contribute to the family's monthly income by making custom-ordered dresses and other small household items.

Dlnya took a loan from Relief International - Microfinance Iraq to improve her sewing business by replacing her old sewing machine and purchasing an oversewing machine as well as some fabric and raw materials.

Relief International - Microfinance Iraq offers "Group loans" for clients unable to provide a guarantor - thereby unable to apply for a loan as an individual. As a group, the members collectively guarantee the loan. Groups consist of 3 to 5 clients and each client is evaluated on his or her repayment capacity. All group members receive the same loan amount as the individual with the lowest repayment capacity in the group. 

Based on the political and social challenges of lending in Iraq, personally identifiable information about this borrower has been altered for their protection. RI-Iraq appreciates Kiva lenders' consideration of these challenges and encourages lenders to continue their support for Iraqi borrowers.

loans.use: to replace her old sewing machine, purchase an oversewing machine, fabric and raw materials

loans.name: Bahra's Group

texts.en:
Bahra is 28 years old, an Iraqi wife with four children. Working from home, she has been using her sewing skills for the past three years to contribute to the family's income in addition to keeping the household and taking care of the children. 

To improve her opportunities and generate more income by providing better-quality service to her customers, Bahra took a loan from Relief International - Microfinance Iraq to purchase an oversewing machine, a chair for her work area, and an iron.

Relief International - Microfinance Iraq offers "Group loans" for clients unable to provide a guarantor - thereby unable to apply for a loan as an individual. As a group, the members collectively guarantee the loan. Groups consist of 3 to 5 clients and each client is evaluated on his or her repayment capacity. All group members receive the same loan amount as the individual with the lowest repayment capacity in the group. 
 
Based on the political and social challenges of lending in Iraq, personally identifiable information about this borrower has been altered for their protection. RI-Iraq appreciates Kiva lenders' consideration of these challenges and encourages lenders to continue their support for Iraqi borrowers.

loans.use: to purchase an oversewing machine, a chair for her work area, and an iron

loans.name: Adolfo

texts.es: Adolfo de 61 años de edad, habita en casa familiar junto a su esposa e hijo. Posee una barbería en la cual presta sus servicios día con día a los diferentes clientes que posee. Tiene muchos años de dedicarse a este negocio por lo que ya cuenta con mucha experiencia y sobre todo con clientes fijos que dan buenas referencias de su trabajo ya que están muy satisfechos con el servicio que reciben. El señor Adolfo ha trabajado toda su vida para sacar adelante a su familia y poder darles  lo necesario. Últimamente ha notado que la situación económica no es  muy buena y que cada día la situación es más difícil. Todo  esto lo ha alarmado ya que para él lo más importante es que su familia tengo lo necesario para vivir y algún día pueda mejorar sus condiciones de vida. Con todo lo anterior ha decidido poner atención antes de que sea demasiado tarde. Tomo la decisión de solicitar este crédito a INTEGRAL para invertir en su barbería en la compra de los materiales necesarios como: tijeras, capas, gel, peines y de mas artículos que son necesarios para prestar el mejor servicio posible dentro de su barbería. Todo esto lo hace con el fin de atraer a más clientes que le generen un aumento en sus ingresos y por consecuencia le permitan lograr su deseo de mejorar su calidad de vida y la de su familia.
texts.en:
Adolfo, 61, lives in the family home with his wife and son.  He has a barber shop where he provides services to the customers he has daily.  He has been in this business for many years so he has much experience in it and has regular customers who give good references of his work since they are very satisfied with the service they receive.

Adolfo has worked his entire life to move his family forward and to be able to give them what’s necessary.  He’s noted lately that the economic situation isn’t very good and every day the situation becomes worse.  All of this has alarmed him because for him the most important thing is that his family has everything needed to live and one day is able to improve their living conditions.

With all the above, he’s decided to pay attention before it’s too late.  He made the decision to ask INTEGRAL for this loan to invest in his barber shop buying needed supplies like: scissors, capes, gel, combs and other items needed to provide the best possible service in his barber shop.  He does all this hoping to attract more customers that will generate an increase in his income and as a result manage to reach his dream of improving his and his family’s quality of life.

loans.use: to buy scissors, capes, gel, combs, etc.

loans.name: Kyeni

texts.en:
Kyeni is a resident of Changamwe, Kenya. She is a married mother of three children and is involved in the transport industry.  She has a business that she has run for the past year. Kyeni began the business from her own savings.

Kyeni was introduced to Milango by her friends and is applying for a loan of 80,000 Kenyan shillings to purchase another motorcycle. Her dream is to own a taxi and she is determined to put savings from her additional income as a result of this loan towards this goal.

Kyeni's current business challenges are the high cost of fuel and the related fees to the government agencies, but she believes that she can overcome these challenges by increasing the number of motorcylces in her fleet in order to increase her revenue.

loans.use: To purchase another motorcycle.

loans.name: Luis Antonio

texts.es: Luis Antonio de 36 años de edad, habita en casa alquilada junto a su querida esposa desde hace varios años. Él se dedica a prestar servicio de transporte. Posee un microbús el cual es su principal herramienta para realizar su trabajo. Es muy responsable y trabajador por lo que muchas personas lo conocen y dan buenas referencias de su trabajo. Gracias a su carisma ha sabido ganarse la confianza de muchas personas en la zona los cuales cada día lo prefieren más. Últimamente ha notado un deterioro en su microbús ya que día con día lo usa para salir hacer los viajes y poder ganarse el pan de cada día. Por lo anterior solicita este  crédito a INTEGRAL para invertir en la compra de repuestos para su vehículo, ya que sin este no podría realizar su trabajo. Todo esto lo hace con el fin de continuar prestando el mejor servicio a sus clientes y poder así seguir manteniendo activo su negocio que le permita llevar el pan de cada día a su hogar.
texts.en:
Luis Antonio, 36, has been living in a rented house with his beloved wife for several years.  He provides transportation services.   He owns a minibus that’s his main work tool.  He’s very responsible and hardworking which is why many people know him and give him good work references.  Thanks to his charisma he’s managed to win over the trust of many people in the zone who prefer him more each day.

Lately he’s noticed that his minibus is breaking down because he uses it daily to do the trips in order to earn his daily bread.  Because of this, he’s asking INTEGRAL for a loan to buy spare parts for his vehicle because without it he will be unable to do his work.  He does all this aiming at continuing to provide the best service for his customers thus managing to stay in business and being able to bring daily bread to his home.

loans.use: to buy spare parts for his vehicle.

loans.name: Ibrahim

texts.en:
Ibrahim is a resident of Changamwe, Kenya. He runs a retail shop which he has been operating for three years. In this shop he sells sugar, wheat flour, etc. He is single. He joined Milango two years ago to access credit for business expansion.

Ibrahim is applying for a loan of 50,000 Kenyan shillings to purchase retail stock such as sugar, maize flour, and cereals, etc. Besides this business, Ibrahim also runs a wood workshop. The main challenges to both businesses are high transportation costs and some clients not paying on time.

Ibrahim's future aspiration is to open a wholesale shop and he believes that he can run the businesses fairly and develop a residential house from the additional income he earns as a result of this loan.

loans.use: To purchase retail stock, such as sugar, maize flour, and cereals.

loans.name: Heba's Group

texts.en:
Heba is a 20-year-old Iraqi woman. She is married and has one child. For the past two years, she has been using her sewing skills to work from home. She fills sewing and tailoring orders to bring in some extra income for her new family.

In the past, Heba took out a loan from Relief International - Microfinance Iraq to refurbish her work area to improve her work conditions. Now Heba has a loan to further enhance her sewing business opportunities. With the loan, she plans to purchase a small generator, an overlock sewing machine and an iron stand, hoping she will be able to provide her customers with better quality service.

Relief International - Microfinance Iraq offers group loans for clients unable to provide a guarantor - thereby unable to apply for a loan as an individual. As a group, the members collectively guarantee the loan. Groups consist of 3 to 5 clients and each client is evaluated on his or her repayment capacity. All group members receive the same loan amount as the individual with the lowest repayment capacity in the group.

loans.use: to purchase a small generator, an overlock machine and an iron stand

loans.name: Maribel

texts.es:
Maribel es una mujer de 24 años de edad, es conviviente y tiene 2 hijos menores de edad a su cargo. Vive en el distrito de Mórrope, y tiene buenas relaciones con sus vecinos. La zona donde vive es urbano rural, a 20 minutos de Lambayeque. Los pobladores de su sector sin trabajadores independientes dedicados a la agricultura y a la crianza de animales.
La actividad a la que se dedica es la crianza de animales en su domicilio. Su esposo se dedica a labores relacionadas con la agricultura y en molinos de Lambayeque como estibador. En el negocio de venta de animales ya cuenta con clientela fija.
El monto del crédito asciende a 1000 nuevos soles, los cuales se destinarán a la inversión para conexiones de agua en su domicilio y compra de ganado caprino, ovino y aves de corral para la crianza. Maribel piensa acrecentar su alcance de venta para mejorar su calidad de vida.
texts.en:
Maribel is a 24-year-old woman who lives with her partner and has two minor children in her care.  She lives in the district of Mórrope and has good relationships with her neighbors.  She lives in a mixed urban/rural zone 20 minutes from Lambayeque.  The residents of her area are independent workers who work in farming and raising animals.

The work she does is raising animals at home.  Her husband works in farm-related labor and as a stevedore in mills in Lambayeque.  In the animal-raising business she already has steady customers.

The total of the loan amounts to 1000 nuevos soles (PEN), which will be invested in water connections in her home and buying goats, sheep, and poultry to raise.

Maribel plans to increase her range of sales to improve her quality of life.

loans.use: to make some modifications to her home.

loans.name: Tho

texts.en:
Tho, 49, is married and resides with her husband and three children in Siem Reap Province, Cambodia. She and her husband have been successfully involved in the agricultural business for years and have extensive experience. They grow crops and raise cattle, and earn about $5 per day. One of her children is a chef who earns about $3 per day.

Tho plans to use this loan of U.S. $800 to buy a motorbike for commuting. Buying the motorbike would enable her to keep the money she now spends on transportation fare.

In the future, Tho says she would like to make improvements to her house so that her family can live more comfortably.

loans.use: to purchase a motorbike to commute

loans.name: Sabaly Group

texts.fr:
Constitué de 4 mariées, 1 veuve et 1 divorcée, les membres de groupe Sabaly vivent majoritairement dans des familles traditionnelles avec une moyenne d’âge de 41 ans et 5 enfants. Elles habitent toutes dans la ville de Sikasso (3ème Région administrative du Mali) et se sont connues à travers des liens de parenté, de voisinage et de mariage. Les membres du groupe font le petit commerce, de fruits, des condiments alimentaires, de tissus, de pagnes et de la transformation de fruits en jus : de gingembre, de tamarin, raisins, de zaban, baobab, etc. 
Dans le but d’augmenter leurs fonds de commerce, les membres du groupe ont intégré  Soro Yiriwaso et sont à leur 12ème cycle de prêt solidaire.
Madame Mariam (première femme debout de la droite vers la gauche sur la photo) est l’une des transformatrices et vendeuses des jus de fruits du groupe. Elle compte utiliser son prêt pour acheter, 1 sac de sucre, 20 kilos de gingembre, 2 paquets d’arômes et 1 paquet de sachet. Elle s’approvisionne sur place auprès des grossistes et effectue ses ventes, après préparation de ses jus de gingembre mis en sachet et bidons, en détail, au comptant et à crédit, à domicile, en ambulant et au marché, à une clientèle composée d’hommes et de femmes. Madame Mariam compte réaliser avec ce prêt un bénéfice mensuel moyen de 40.000 FCFA qui sera utilisé, pour être réinvesti dans l’activité et prendre en charge  certains besoins du foyer.
texts.en:
Made up of four married women, one widow, and one divorcee, the members of the Sabaly Group live in large traditional families, are on average 41 years old, and each have five children.  They all live in the town of Sikasso (the third administrative region of Mali) and know each other through marriages, kinship, and as neighbors.  The group members run small businesses, selling fruits, condiments, fabric, and clothing, and also process fruits into juices: ginger, tamarind, grape, zaban, and baobab.

In order to increase their working capital, the group members partnered with Soro Yiriwaso and are in their twelfth group loan cycle.  Madam Mariam (the first woman in the front from the right on the left of the photo) is one of the group's juice makers and sellers.  She intends to use her loan to buy one bag of sugar, 20 kilos of ginger-root, two packets of flavoring, and one packet of spice.  She buys her supplies locally from wholesellers, and after making her gingerjuice, performs her retail sales for cash or credit, in the streets and in the market, to a clientele made up of men and women.  Madam Marian hopes to make an average monthly profit of 40,000 FCFA which she will use to reinvest in her business and care for  her household needs.

loans.use: to purchase required inputs for making fruit juice.

loans.name: Sonia Yanira

texts.es: Sonia Yanira habita junto a su querida hija en casa de su propiedad. Ella se dedica a la venta de variedad de frutas y bebidas. Posee un puesto en una zona muy estratégica la cual es a orilla de calle y es muy transitada. Sonia ha trabajado toda su vida para sacar adelante a su querida familia la cual depende únicamente de los ingresos que percibe en el negocio. Vive en condiciones muy humildes pero eso no la limita a seguir trabajando y luchando por sacar adelante a su familia.  Ella se caracteriza por ser amable, responsable y emprendedora. Como toda mujer emprendedora quiere aprovechar este periodo de vacaciones que se avecinan para invertir en su negocio con el fin de dar una mayor oferta a sus clientes dado que en estas fechas las demandas aumentan y quiere estar preparada. Para esto ha tomado la decisión de solicitar este crédito a INTEGRAL para comprar variedad de frutas y bebidas al por mayor de tal forma que los clientes siempre encuentren abastecido su negocio cuando lo visiten. De esta forma espera mejorar su nivel de ventas e ingresos que le  permitan accesar a mejores oportunidades de vida.
texts.en:
Sonia Yanira lives with her beloved daughter in her own house. She sells a variety of fruits and drinks. She has a stand in a very strategic location at the edge of a street, where there is a lot of foot traffic.

Sonia has worked all her life to raise her dear family which depends solely on the income she earns in her business. She lives in very humble circumstances, but that does not limit her from continuing to work and struggle to help her family get ahead in life. 

She is known for being friendly, responsible, and enterprising. Like every enterprising woman, she wishes to take advantage of the vacation period that is approaching, to invest in her business. This is with the aim of giving her customers a greater selection, given that on these days demand increases, and she wants to be prepared. 

This is why she has taken the decision to apply to Integral for this loan, in order to buy a variety of fruits and drinks at wholesale, so that customers always find her business stocked when they visit it. This way she hopes to improve her level of sales and income, which will allow her to access better opportunities in life.

loans.use: To buy a variety of fruits and drinks.

loans.name: Osiris Jazmín

texts.es: Osiris Jazmín de 28 años de edad, habita junto a su madre y hermana en casa familiar.  Ella es una mujer emprendedora y muy trabajadora. Empieza su día desde muy temprano para poder hacer todas las tareas de su hogar y luego continuar con su negocio. Se dedica a la venta de plátanos y bananos al por mayor y detalle, ya tiene varios años de  dedicarse a esta actividad y es la que le ha permitido ayudar a su familia en las necesidades básicas del hogar. Ella quiere  aumentar la oferta de sus productos  para poder atraer a más clientes que le ayuden a mejorar sus ventas y por ende su situación económica. Esto la ha llevado a tomar la decisión de solicitar este crédito a INTEGRAL para invertir en la compra de plátanos y bananas al por mayor y poder cubrir una mayor demanda de mercado que le permita mejorar sus ingresos así como su calidad de vida.  Confía en Dios que esto le ayudará a mejorar su situación económica.
texts.en:
Osiris Jazmín, 28, lives with her mother and sister in the family house.  She is an enterprising and very hardworking woman.  She begins her day very early to be able to do all the housework and then continue with her business.

She works selling plantains and bananas wholesale and retail.  She has done this work for several years and it has allowed her to help her family with the basic household necessities.

She wants to expand her product offerings to be able to attract more customers to help her improve her sales and, consequently, her economic situation.  This led her to make the decision to request this loan from INTEGRAL to invest in buying plantains and bananas wholesale.

She will be able to meet a greater market demand, which will allow her to improve her income as well as her quality of life.  She trusts in God that this will help her to improve her economic situation.

loans.use: to buy plantains and bananas wholesale.

loans.name: Tolibjon

texts.ru: Толибчон трудолюбивый и добрый человек, ему 24 года. Он женат и на воспитании имеет одного ребенка. Жена занимается домохозяйством. Его мать и отец живут с ним. Более 5 лет он занимается купле- продажей скота. Толибчон начинал свой бизнес с продажи мелкого рогатого скота. В этом году он планирует увеличить запасы корма и поголовье скота. За займом обращается впервые и надеется на вашу поддержку. Толибчон запрашивает займ для покупки скота с целью пополнения оборотного капитала.
texts.en: Tolibjon is 24 years old and a hardworking and decent man.  He is married and is raising a child.  His wife takes care of their home and his mother and father live with him.   For more than 5 years he has been in the cattle business.  Tolibjon started his business by selling sheep and goats.  This year he is planning to increase his stock of feed and the size of his herd.  This is his first time requesting a loan and he is relying on your support.  He is requesting the loan to buy cattle with the goal of supplementing his working capital.

loans.use: to buy cattle

loans.name: Olga Leonor

texts.es:
Olga, se dedica a administrar una tienda y pupuseria, vive en casa propia con su esposo y dos nietos, ella inicio el negocio por iniciativa propia, su horario es de 5:00am hasta las 9:00pm, el lugar donde está ubicada es propicio para las buenas ventas, porque tiene cerca el estadio y el cementerio, su experiencia en el negocio es de 30 años. 
Ella solicita un préstamo para la compra de productos de primera necesidad y bebidas, como por ejemplo, boquitas, galletas, pastas, huevos, embutidos, gaseosas, jugos,  para poder tener más surtido el negocio.
El objetivo de Olga es crecer, tener la oportunidad de instalar un pequeño restaurante, para ser más rentable el negocio.
texts.en:
Olga runs her grocery store and “pupusería” [grilled, stuffed corncakes shop]. She lives in her own house with her husband and two grandchildren.  She started the business on her own initiative.  Her schedule is 5am to 9pm.  The place where it’s located is apt for good sales because it’s near the stadium and the cemetery; she has 30 years’ work experience.

She asks for the loan to buy basic staple items and beverages like for example: snacks, cookies, pasta, eggs, canned goods, soft-drinks and juices to have a better-stocked store.  Olga’s objective is to grow in order to be able to open a small restaurant to make the business more profitable.

loans.use: to buy snacks, cookies, pasta, eggs, canned goods, soft-drinks and juices.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase stock, an awning and a security system for her store and begin a marketing campaign.

loans.name: Bahromjon

texts.ru: Бахромчон женат и на воспитании имеет двоих детей. Его отец умер , когда ему было  12 лет. Он остался один с матерью. Условия жизни у них были очень тяжелые. После занятий в школе работал на поле, чтобы заработать денег для  содержания семьи. Однажды он заболел и  долгое время пролежал  в больнице. Когда он выздоровел, уехал в Россию на заработки, и там проработал 5 лет. Приехав на Родину он опять начал заниматься скотоводством и земледелием. Уже более 3-х лет занимается этим бизнесом. Бахромчон хотел бы получить займ для покупки семян арбуза, кукурузы и горюче-смазочных материалов. А также хочет купить скот для увлечения поголовья скота.
texts.en:
Bahromjon is married and is raising two children.  His father died when Bahromjon was 12 years old and he was left alone with his mother.  Their circumstances were very difficult.  After class, he would go to work in the fields to earn money to support the family.  Once he fell ill and was in the hospital for a long time.  After he recovered, he went to Russia to earn money and he worked there for 5 years.   When he returned to his homeland, he started again to farm and to keep cattle.  He has been in this business for three years now.  

Bahromjon would like to get a loan for the purchase of watermelon and corn seed, and for fuel and lubricants.  He would also like to buy cattle to increase the size of his herd.

loans.use: to buy seed, fuel, and lubricants

loans.name: María Dolores

texts.es: María Dolores de 65 años de edad, reside en casa de su propiedad junto con su esposo.  María  es una mujer  luchadora, llena de vida y entregada en su trabajo. Ella  Posee una pequeña tienda en su casa de habitación en la cual ofrece diferentes artículos como: arroz, frijoles, azúcar golosinas, etc. Ella  sabe que solo trabajando logrará sacar adelante a su querida familia y es por esto que ha tomado la decisión de solicitar este crédito ya que sueña con ver su negocio crecer, que cuente con los productos necesarios para atraer a más clientes y así poder convertirse en el mas preferido de la zona. Con el crédito pretende comprar variedad de productos de tienda como: Azúcar, leche, arroz, frijoles, bebidas, pan dulce, golosinas, macarrones, condimentos, etc. Así tendría variedad de productos y los clientes la preferirían más ya que está llena de  carisma y amabilidad. De esta forma confía que sus ganancias se verán aumentadas lo que significa que ella podría ofrecer mejores condiciones de vida a su familia.
texts.en:
María Dolores is 65, and lives with her husband in their own house. María is a determined woman, full of life, and devoted to her work. She has a small store in her home, where she sells various items such as rice, beans, sugar, candy, etc. 

She knows that only by working will she succeed in helping her dear family get ahead in life, and this is why she has made the decision to apply for this loan. She dreams of seeing her business grow; of having the products necessary to attract more customers, and this way becoming the preferred store in the area. 

With the loan, she intends to buy a variety of store products such as sugar, milk, rice, beans, drinks, sweet bread, candy, macaroni, condiments, etc. This way she would have a variety of products and her customers would prefer her store, as it is full of friendliness and charm. This way she is confident that her earnings will increase, which means she would be able to provide her family with better living conditions.

loans.use: To buy sugar, milk, rice, beans, drinks, sweet bread, candy, macaroni, condiments, etc.

loans.name: Pedro Gustavo

texts.es:
Pedro, vive con su esposa y tres hijos de 15, 13, 6 años de edad, él se dedica al comercio de melaza (es un derivado de la caña de azúcar, sirve alimentar el ganado) y presta servicio de transporte, su horario es de 6:00am a 6:00pm, este horario es variado, Pedro ha logrado mantener a su familia a través de este oficio.
Él está solicitando un préstamo para la compra de melaza, con la intensión de tenerlo le generara más ingresos para el hogar.
La aspiración de Pedro es trabajar bien con este préstamo y a futuro tener el negocio libre de deudas.
texts.en:
Pedro lives with his wife and three children who are 15, 13 and 6 years old.  He is a molasses (derived from sugarcane and used as cattle feed) merchant.  He also provides transportation services.  His schedule is 6am to 6pm but it can vary.  Pedro has managed to support his family through this occupation.

He’s asking for a loan to buy molasses with the intention of having it to generate more household income.  His goal is to work well with this loan and in future have a debt-free business.

loans.use: to buy molasses.

loans.name: Maria Alicia

texts.es:
María, vive con sus dos hijos y su esposo, sus hijos tienen 16 y 12 años de edad, se dedica a la venta de frutas y verduras, trabaja desde las 7:00am hasta las 3:00pm, tiene un local en el mercado, este negocio surgió por iniciativa propia desde hace 10 años. 
Ella está solicitando un préstamo para la compra frutas y verduras frescas como mangos, uvas, manzanas, repollos, zanahorias, papas, tomates, cebollas, esto le ayudaran a incrementar el inventario y le ayudaran a tener una mejor rentabilidad.
La aspiración de María es mantener un negocio fuerte, bien surtido de frutos frescos, para atender mejor a la clientela.
texts.en:
María lives with her two children and her husband; her children are 16 and 12 years old.  She sells fruit and vegetables.  She works from 7am until 3pm.  She has a stand in the market.  This business arose from her own initiative ten years ago.

She is asking for a loan to buy fruit and vegetables like mangoes, grapes, apples, cabbage, carrots, potatoes, tomatoes and onions that will help her increase inventory and help her have better profitability.  María’s goal is to keep her business strong, well stocked with fresh fruit, to provide better customer service.

loans.use: to buy fruit and vegetables.

loans.name: Sokunthea

texts.en: Sokunthea, 37, is married and resides with her husband and two children in Siem Reap Province, Cambodia. She and her husband have been involved in making creels (a type of small wicker basket) to sell for over ten years, earning approximately US $7 per day. In order to improve her business, Sokunthea is requesting a loan of US $1,000 to purchase a motorbike and a trailer for delivering her creels to sell. This purchase would enable her to carry more of her creels to sell faster. In the future, she would like to use the further profit to expand her business and help her children get bachelor's degrees.

loans.use: to purchase a motorbike and a trailer for delivering her creels to sell.

loans.name: Manuel De Jesús

texts.es: Manuel de Jesús habita en casa de su propiedad junto con su esposa e hijos. Él se dedica a la agricultura. Cultiva los principales granos básicos de la región: maíz y frijoles. Ha trabajado toda su vida en esta actividad y es así como se ha ganado el pan de cada día para su hogar. Él es un hombre muy responsable, trabajador y emprendedor.  Su sueño es poder dar a su familia mejores condiciones de vida a las que posee ya que la situación económica actual es muy difícil y muchas veces no cuenta con lo necesario para la familia. Cada año realiza esta actividad de cultivar la tierra y luego pone a la venta una parte de la cosecha, con cuyas ganancias logra cubrir otras necesidades del hogar. Ha tomado la decisión de solicitar este crédito a INTEGRAL para comprar los principales insumos agrícolas (insecticidas, abonos, semillas) que le permitan seguir cultivando la tierra. Espera obtener resultados favorables que le permitan accesar a una mejor calidad de vida.
texts.en:
Manuel de Jesús lives with his wife and children in his own house. He is a farmer. He grows the main staples of the area: corn and beans. He has worked all his life in this occupation, and this is how he has earned his household's daily bread. 

He is a very responsible, hard-working and enterprising man. His dream is to be able to provide his family with better living conditions than it has now;  because the current economic situation is very difficult, and many times he doesn't have what he needs for his family.  

Each year, he carries out his work of cultivating the land, and then puts part of the harvest up for sale, and with the earnings manages to cover other household needs. 

He has made the decision to apply to Integral for this loan, in order to buy the main agricultural supplies: insecticides, fertilizers and seed, that will allow him to keep cultivating the land. He hopes to obtain favorable results that will allow him to access a better quality of life.

loans.use: To buy insecticides, fertilizers and seed.

loans.name: Tuburcio

texts.es:
El señor Tiburcio tiene 34 años de edad casado con la señora Eugenia más de 12 años ambos con una instrucciones nivel primario, tienen 5 hijos dependientes de diferentes edades que estudian nivel primario y secundario, la familia vive más de 14 años en la comunidad de 2da Candelaria al norte de Colomi de la ciudad de Cochabamba.                                                                                                                                                                                                                                 El señor Tiburcio y su esposa son productores de papa, haba, papaliza, cultivando en 5 has de terreno herencia de sus padres, Don Tiburcio solicita un préstamo a nuestra Institución CIDRE IFD para comprar 2,5 camiones de abono orgánico (gallinaza) según ellos para aprovechar el precio bajo por la época ya que sus cultivos no están todavía para la venta, además en otras Entidades Financieras le pidieron muchos requisitos para acceder a un crédito.                                                                                                                                           Por último el señor Tiburcio se quedó  muy contento y feliz al haber tenido esta oportunidad, ahora sembraran en más superficie.
Entre sus metas esta seguir  apoyando en los estudio a sus hijos hasta que tengan una profesión  para que de esa manera puedan tener  un futuro mejor que él.
texts.en:
Tiburcio, 34, has been married to Eugenia for more than 12 years.  They both have elementary level education.  They have five dependent children of various ages attending primary and secondary schools.   The family has lived for more than 14 years in the community of 2da Candelaria north of Colomi in the city of Cochabamba.

Tiburcio and his wife are potato, broad bean and papalisa [a tuber] farmers; they grow on five hectares of land he inherited from his parents.  

Tiburcio is asking CIDRE IFD for a loan to buy 2.5 truckloads of ‘gallinaza’ [organic chicken manure] according to them to take advantage of the low seasonal price since their crops are not yet ready for sale.  Besides, other financial institutions had many requirements to access credit.

Lastly, Tiburcio was very happy to have had this opportunity.  Now they will be able to plant a larger surface area.  Among his goals is to continue supporting his children’s schooling so that they will have a better future than him.

loans.use: to buy organic manure.

loans.name: Maria De La Paz

texts.es:
María, vive con su hija y tres nietos,  se dedica a la venta de leña, agua y piñatas, ella aprendió de una tía, tambien aprendió a hacer flores, el negocio de la leña surgió por iniciativa propia desde hace 8 años, su horario de venta es de 7:00am a 4:00pm.
Ella solicita un préstamo para la compra de 3 camionadas de leña y material para hacer las piñatas como papel, alambre, colorante, pega, que son los necesarios para darle continuidad al negocio, con esto espera generar más ganancias para el sustento familiar.
La aspiración de María es tener un negocio solvente de deudas, para tener más libre las ganancias.
texts.en:
Maria lives with her daughter and three grandchildren. She sells firewood, water, and piñatas. Her aunt taught her to be a saleswoman. She also learned to make flowers. She started her firewood business on her own eight years ago. She works from 7:00 A.M. to 4:00 P.M.
She is requesting a loan to purchase three truckloads of firewood and materials to make piñatas, like paper, wire, dye, and glue. These items are necessary for her business to have continuity. With this loan, she hopes to earn more income to provide for her family.
Maria’s hope is to have a debt-free business so that she can earn more income.

loans.use: to purchase three truckloads of firewood and paper, wire, dye, and glue.

loans.name: Majed

texts.en:
Majed is a 35-year-old who dreams of a comfortable life someday. His dream leads him to strive harder to earn an income. He has been operating his own business selling toys in a shop. It provides enough income to cover his family's daily expenses. He has been in this business for many years and he is aiming for a better income from it. His business has gradually grown and he has specialized in everything. 

Due to the current bad situation in Yemen, he is making less profit from his enterprise. So, he requested a loan of 100,000 Yemeni rials from AMB in order to buy additional stock of toys, games and comics for his store that will increase his profit. With this loan, he will be able to develop his business and eventually obtain his dream.

loans.use: to buy additional stock of toys, games and comics for his business.

loans.name: Sus

texts.en:
To earn a living, Sus, 40, and her husband help each other in managing their farm where they plant rice and different kinds of beans and vegetables to sell. They have been farmers for ages and have learned well from their experience to ensure a good harvest. This couple tries hard to provide basic necessities for their family, especially education for their six children.

Sus is now requesting a loan from HKL to purchase beans and sacks of fertilizers to expand production. She believes that through her patience and sacrifices, she will be able to improve the business and make it a viable and profitable source of income.

loans.use: to purchase beans and sacks of fertilizers to expand production.

loans.name: Birdinazar

texts.ru: Бирдиназар добрый и трудолюбивый человек. Он женат и на воспитании имеет троих несовершеннолетних детей. Более 4 лет он занимается выращиванием сельхозпродуктов. Жена работает в дехканском хозяйстве. Бирдиназар после окончания средней школы нигде не обучался, решил обучать своих детей в ВУЗе, чтобы им дать  высшее образование. Для обучения детей необходимы средства.  Бирдиназар решил  увеличить объем бизнеса, чтобы получить больше дохода. От полученной прибыли часть израсходует для обучения своих детей. Бирдиназар запрашивает займ для покупки минеральных удобрений и семян для посева. Он надеется на вашу помощь и доброту.
texts.en:
Birdinazar is a good and hardworking man.  He is married and is raising three minor children.  For more than four years he has been farming food crops.  His wife is a farm worker.  Birdinazar did not study after graduating from middle school and decided that his children would study in institutions of higher learning in order to give them a university education.   To educate one's children requires financial means.  Birdinazar decided to increase the volume of his business to earn a larger income.  A part of his increased income will be expended on his children's education.

Birdinazar is requesting a loan for the purchase mineral fertilizers and seed.  He is relying on your help and kindness.

loans.use: to buy seed and mineral fertilizers

loans.name: Sandra Isabel

texts.es:
Sandra, vive con su esposo y dos hijos de 5 y 2 años de edad, se dedica a un negocio de bisutería, administrando un taller en el que elabora los collares, pulseras, accesorios, ella aprendió recibiendo clases, luego decidió instalar su propio negocio, su horario es de 9:00am hasta las 6:00pm, de lunes a viernes.
Ella solicita un préstamo para invertirlo en la compra de materiales para elaborar la bisutería, como hilos, piedras, dijes, con esto pueda elaborar mas mercadería, para ofrecer a la clientela.
La aspiración de Sandra es crecer en el mercado, instalando un nuevo negocio en otro punto del mercado, además poder tener su propia casa.
texts.en:
Sandra lives with her husband and two children, who are five and two years old. She sells imitation jewelry, and offers a workshop on how to make necklaces, bracelets, and accessories. She learned her trade by taking classes, and then decided to start her own business. She works from 9:00 A.M. to 6:00 P.M. from Monday to Friday.
She is requesting a loan to invest by purchasing materials to make jewelry, like thread, stones, and lockets, which she will use to make more merchandise to offer her customers. Sandra’s hope is to grow in the market by opening a new business in another spot in the market, and also to be able to have her own house.

loans.use: to purchase thread, stones, and lockets to make necklaces.

loans.name: Zafar

texts.ru: Зафар женат и воспитании имеет двоих детей. Он очень трудолюбивый человек, который занимается выращиванием сельхозкультур более 8 лет. Зафар с детства занимается этим бизнесом, а также скотоводством. В основном он выращивает репчатый лук и кукурузу на зерно, а затем полученный урожай реализует на рынке за хорошую цену. Зафар хочет получить прибыль от продажи сельхозкультур и построить дом для своей семьи. Он хочет жить отдельно, потому, что братья выросли и их надо женить. Зафар запрашивает займ для покупки минеральных удобрений, семян лука и кукурузы.
texts.en: Zafar is married and is raising two children.  He is a very hardworking man who has been growing food crops for oven 8 years.  Zafar has been in this business, as well as animal husbandry, since childhood.  Primarily he grows onions and corn for seed, both of which he sells at the market for a good price.  Zafar would like to take the profit from selling his crops and build a house for his family.  He wants to live alone with his family because his brothers have grown up and it's time for them to be married.  Zafar is requesting the loan for the purchase of mineral fertilizers and onion and corn seed.

loans.use: to buy mineral fertilizers and seeds

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase corn, cheese, chicharrón [pork skins], oil, and condiments.

loans.name: Sam Art

texts.en:
Sam Art, 53, is married and resides with her husband and three children in Siem Reap Province, Cambodia. She and her husband have been involved in an agricultural business for over ten years, have an extensive experience, and are successful in their career. They are involved in growing agricultural crops and fattening up cattle. Additionally, her husband is a gardener. They earn approximately US $8 per day. 

Due to lack of funds, Sam Art is requesting a loan of US $1,000 to purchase bean seeds and fertilizer. By doing so, she will be able to make more profit to support her family. In the future, she would like to expand her business and help her children get bachelor's degrees in agriculture. Moreover, she hopes to rebuild her present house to make it bigger and more suitable for her family’s living conditions.

loans.use: to purchase bean seeds and fertilizer.

loans.name: San

texts.en:
San, age 35, has operated a small general store for seven years. This business earns her a suitable income, which she uses to provide for her family's daily needs. She sells a variety of products such as canned food, snacks, beverages, groceries, and some kinds of beauty products. She has a life partner and has two children attending school.

To improve her business, San is asking for financial assistance in the amount of US $1,300 to increase the volume of her store’s merchandise. In this way, she can generate greater profits to better her living conditions some day.

loans.use: to increase the volume of her store’s merchandise.

loans.name: Jose David

texts.es:
José, vive con su esposa y dos hijos de 12 y 8 años de edad, la casa en la que residen es propia, él aprendió desde joven la agricultura porque su padre lo instruyo, hasta hoy ha sido su fuente de ingreso.
Él está solicitando un préstamo para la compra de abono y semilla,  para iniciar el cultivo y poder aplicar lo necesario en el proceso, con estos materiales espera mantener una buena cosecha, que le servirá para la alimentación de la familia y además vender una parte. 
La aspiración de José es poderse comprar maquinaria necesaria para el trabajo con la tierra, con lo que evitara buscar o alquilar.
texts.en:
Jose lives with his wife and two children, who are twelve and eight years old. They live in their own home. His father taught him about agriculture when he was young, and it has been his source of income up till today.
He is requesting a loan to purchase fertilizer and seeds so he can plant his crops and be able to apply fertilizer when the time is appropriate. With these materials he hopes to yield a good harvest, which he will use to feed his family and also to sell part of it.
Jose’s hope is to be able to purchase the machinery he needs to work the earth, which will keep him from having to search for it or rent it.

loans.use: to purchase fertilizer and seeds.

loans.name: Santos Eduardo

texts.es:
Santos, es ganadero, tiene casa propia en la que vive con su esposa y sus tres hijos, él se dedica a la compra y venta de ganadería, desde hace 3 años esta realizando el negocio.
Actualmente solicita un préstamo para la compra de ganado, pues su intensión es crecer en el negocio, mejorando su condición e ingresos para la familia.
La aspiración de él  es que a través de los préstamos pueda mejorar las condiciones económicas de la familia, asegurándoles un mejor futuro.
texts.en:
Santos is a cattleman.  He has his own house where he lives with his wife and three children.  He buys and sells cattle.  He’s been in this business for three years.

He’s asking for a loan at present to buy cattle because his intention is to make his business grow improving his condition and income for the family.  His hope is that through the loans he will be able to improve his family’s economy insuring them a better future.

loans.use: to buy cattle.

loans.name: Nem

texts.en:
Nem is 56 years old and a responsible mother of 4 children, living in Dongkor commune, a suburb area of Phnom Penh city. She is involved in managing household things and taking care of the family, while her husband works to buy and sell rice for profit. This family owns a few plots of land for rice cultivation and as usual, Nem’s husband is the main person in performing the task at the rice field. Also, some of their children help them when they get free time from school.

Nem is seeking for a loan through HKL, one of Kiva's partners, to increase her rice stock for sale and pay for the process of planting dry-season rice. Through using the loan with her patient and effort, Nem hopes to earn a quality of life and attain a comfortable living.

loans.use: to increase her rice stock for sale and pay for the process of planting dry-season rice.

loans.name: Lear

texts.en: Lear, 29, is single and resides with her parents in Siem Reap Province, Cambodia. She is a signer in a restaurant. She earns about USD 7 per day. Due to the difficulty in her family’s transportation, Lear is requesting a loan of USD 1000 to purchase a motorbike to commute. This purchase would enable her to use the saved money on her transportation expenses to support the family. In the future, she would like to create her own music band to play in the wedding ceremony and other parties. Moreover, she hopes to rebuild her present house to make it bigger and more comfortable for her family’s living.

loans.use: to purchase a motorbike to commute

loans.name: Hong

texts.en:
Hong is 45 years old and a married woman with 7 children, 5 of whom are attending school. She’s a very hardworking woman who aspires to obtain ahead and improve her business day to day. Hong is skillful in making bamboo baskets, generating approximately 2.50USD each day from this type of business. “More productivity, more profit” is her method to attain a success in life.  However, the main income provider is her husband works as a policeman in his local commune. 

Due to the lack of the family’s owned vehicle, Hong would like to acquire a loan to purchase a motorcycle for both home and business use. For her prospect, Hong wants to involve herself in trading bamboo baskets in a border market between Cambodia and Thailand.

loans.use: to purchase a motorcycle for both home and business use.

loans.name: Yoeury

texts.en:
Yoeury, 59, is married, resides with her husband and four children in Siem Reap Province, Cambodia. She and her husband have been involved in agricultural business for over twenty years, have an extensive experience and are successful in their career. They are involved in growing rice, vegetables and fattening up cattle. Approximately, they earn USD 10 per day. One of her children is employed in a hotel and earns about USD 5 per day. 

Due to the difficulty in her family’s transportation, Yoeury is requesting a loan of USD 1000 to purchase a motorbike to commute. This purchase would enable her to use the saved money on her transportation expenses to support the family. 

In the future, she would like to expand her business and help her children get bachelor’s degree. Moreover, she plans to rebuild her present house to make it bigger and stronger to provide better living condition for the family.

loans.use: to purchase a motorbike to commute

loans.name: Nurullo

texts.ru: Нурулло очень активный, трудолюбивый и целеустремленный человек. Он женат и на воспитании имеет четверых детей, двух сыновей и двух дочерей. Он имеет дехканское хозяйство и там занимается выращиванием сельхозпродуктов, также занимается скотоводством. Данный момент у него не хватает средств на скотоводство, так как он вложил все свои капиталы на землю. Он нуждается в дополнительных финансах для скотоводства. В предыдущем займе, который он получал от «ИМОН Интернешнл» он доказал свою добросовестность и пунктуальность, также имеет хорошую кредитную историю. Нурулло запрашивает займ для покупки скота с целью расширения бизнеса.
texts.en:
Nurullo is a very energetic, hardworking, and goal-oriented man.  He is married and is raising four children:  two sons and two daughters.  He has a farm where he grows food crops and raises livestock.  At the present, he does not have enough funds for livestock because he has invested all of his capital in the land.  He needs additional financing for purchasing livestock.  

With the last loan he received from IMON International, Nurullo proved himself to be conscientious and punctual, and he has a good credit history.  Nurullo is requesting a loan for the purchase of cattle in order to expand his business.

loans.use: to buy cattle

loans.name: Maria Tulia

texts.es:
Maria Tulia tiene 53 años de edad, es madre soltera y tiene 3 hijos de 25, 17 y 15 años de edad, vive con ellos en el Municipio de Choloma Cortes.
La Señora Maria tiene un negocio de pulpería. Lo inicio hace 10 años y vende productos alimenticios como lácteos, carnes, embutidos, refrescos, jugos etc. Cuenta que inicio trabajando con poco producto pero con la administración que ella ha manejado ha podido ir superando. Con las ganancias y con los préstamos que ha adquirido de ODEF ha  podido surtir más.
Este es su préstamo con ODEF numero ocho, y la cantidad que solicita es de 25,000 lempiras para surtir de productos su negocio como carnes, lácteos, golosinas, embutidos. Para seguir vendiendo y seguir dando el servicio a los clientes.
Su meta en la vida es que su negocio quede como un patrimonio familiar de donde se pueda sacar la fuente de ingresos para cubrir las necesidades del hogar.
texts.en:
María Tulia, 53, is a single mother of three children who are 25, 17 and 15 years old; she lives with them in the municipality of Choloma, Cortes.  

María has a grocery store that she started ten years ago.  She sells food products like dairy products, meats, canned goods, soft-drinks, juice, etc.  She relates that when she started out it was with very few items but with her good administration she’s been improving and has gotten ahead.  With profits and with loans from ODEF she’s been able to stock still more.

This is her ODEF loan #8 and the amount she’s asking for is 25000 lempiras to stock her business with items like meats, dairy products, snacks and canned goods to continue selling and providing customer service.

Her goal in life is that her business remains as a family asset that can be a source of income to cover household expenses.

loans.use: to buy stock merchandise for her store.

loans.name: Juan Alberto

texts.es:
Juan, vive en compañía de su esposa y dos hijos, de 28 y 23 años de edad, él tiene una ladrillera, en la que se dedica a fabricar ladrillo, bloques, de este negocio ha logrado tener lo necesario para su familia.
Actualmente solicita un préstamo para la compra de materiales como cemento, arena, grava, para poder fabricar lo necesario para la construcción, manteniendo niveles de producción altos, para que su clientela encuentre en cualquier necesidad.
La aspiración de Juan es que su fabrica sea reconocida, para ganar clientela, tambien mejorar sus ingresos.
texts.en:
Juan lives with his wife and two children, ages 28 and 23. He owns a brickworks, where he manufactures bricks and cement blocks. With this business, he has managed to meet his family's needs. 

Currently, he is applying for a loan to buy materials such as cement, sand and gravel. This will enable him to manufacture products necessary for construction, and maintain high production levels, so that his customers meet all their requirements.

Juan's ambition is to see his factory become well-known, in order to win customers, and also improve his income.

loans.use: To buy cement, sand and gravel.

loans.name: Maria Gabriela

texts.es: La Sra. Gabriela  tiene 34 años y es casada con una  hija de la edad de 11 años, ella se dedica al tejido a mano de mantas de lana su taller se encuentran ubicado en la zona del  Calvario,  este préstamo es su primera secuencia dentro de la institución, Gabriela  usara este préstamo  para la compra de lana por cantidad y otros materiales que necesita par su actividad,  Gabriela no tiene ningún reto por que ella esta fuera del nivel de competencia de las demás tiendas ya que su trabajo es de muy buena calidad y tiene muchos pedidos, y utilizara los beneficios para seguir comprando materiales para ir tejiendo mas mantas que le dan buenos ingresos, con el tiempo desea exportar sus productos al exterior  e implementar maquinas tejedoras y personal de apoyo, es una persona emprendedora con ganas de superación se siente agradecida con la institución por el apoyo brindado
texts.en:
Gabriela, 34, is married and has an 11 year old daughter.  She hand weaves wool blankets in her shop located in the Calvario zone.  This loan is her first sequence within the institution.  Gabriela will use the loan to buy wool in quantity and other supplies she needs for her activity.

Gabriela has no challenger because she is beyond competition from other stores because the work she does is very good quality and she has many orders.  She will use profits to continue buying materials to continue weaving blankets that produce good income.  In time, she’d like to export her products abroad and install knitting machines and hire support staff.  She’s an enterprising woman who very much wants to improve.  She is grateful to the institution for the support provided.

loans.use: to buy wool and supplies to weave blankets.

loans.name: Teav

texts.en:
Teav is 53 years old and is a married woman who has been living in a small village of Batey district, Kompong Cham province. She has a big family consisting of 7 children; four are single and three are married. One among her children acts as a seamstress and provides sewing services to local people. Teav’s main business is rice farming. She has been managing in this business for over 30 years with experiences. Normally, she grows rice twice a year on her own farmland and she has her spouse help her in this business.

At the present, Teav would like to take out a loan to build a store for her daughter to provide her sewing service. She is very happy for the loan granted and she hopes that she will obtain a good profit from the investment.

loans.use: to build a store for her daughter to provide her sewing service.

loans.name: Tun's Group

texts.en:
Tun lives in Saang village. She is 41 years old and married with 2 children. Both of her sons are staying with the family, one of whom is still in school and another one works as a blacksmith. To earn a living, she has been fishing, growing taro and cultivating rice paddy for almost thirty years. Her family earns around six dollars per day and after netting expense they can save about one dollar and half per day. 
This is her second loan with VisionFund. She applied for the first loan in 2011. After completely repaid the first loan, she requested another one hoping to get the money to buy piglets and fertilizer for her taro plantation. She hopes that the loan can help to improve the living standard of her family and can support her son for high education. Tun now leads a loan group of three female members.

loans.use: To buy piglets and fertilizers

loans.name: Keo

texts.en:
Keo, 30, is married, resides with her husband and four children in Siem Reap Province, Cambodia. She and her husband have been involved in agricultural business for over five years, and are successful in their business. They are involved in growing rice and fattening up cattle. Approximately, they earn USD 7 per day. 

Due to lack of fund, Keo is requesting a loan of USD 500 to purchase rice seeds and fertilizer to grow. This money will help her acquires the security to start the business. 

In the future, she would like to expand her business and help her children get bachelor. Moreover, she hopes to rebuild her present house to make it bigger and more comfortable for her family’s living.

loans.use: to purchase rice seeds and fertilizer to grow

loans.name: Battsetseg

texts.en: Battsetseg is a 31 years old woman who lives with her daughter, mother and her sister. She has been running garment retails business in Govi-Altai province in Southern Mongolia. She has been running garment retails business since 2008. She has an experience before running the business. Based on the experience, she bought a shop counter where she sells clothes for men, women and children. Now she is planning the expand the business activity by buying the supplies in large quantities. Battsetseg is a good-natured woman who says that "I would like to develop the business by bringing the garment in large quantities so that I could raise the income without spending much on transportation". The total amount she is requesting is 1,000,000 MNT to buy more garment.

loans.use: To buy more garments

loans.name: Moul

texts.en:
Moul is 49, a windowed woman who permanently resides in Reussey Keo commune, Phnom Penh city. She lives with 4 single children, 3 of whom are employed to help their mother to earn the income. Moul devotes herself in the business of cultivating rice on a three-hectare farmland to produce income. She typically earns approximately 1.50USD per day from the business. 

And now Moul is asking for a loan from HKL to pay for the rice cultivation. She hopes to obtain a good harvest from this investment. Moul has been a client of HKL for more than three years and this is her third loan, through which she’ll be able to improve her business.

loans.use: to pay for the rice cultivation.

loans.name: Chuluunsuh

texts.en: Chuluunsuh is a 54 years old man who lives with his wife in Dornod province in Eastern Mongolia. His wife is unemployed. He has been running taxi service business since 2006. Previously, he used to work as a driver for 29 years for the private company. He has changed the car and bought a car for his son. He is an experienced and talented driver whose business has been successful and profitable. Chuluunsuh is a hardworking and good man who says that "I would like to expand the business activity by having my car repaired. I am planning to replace its motor. Due to the unpaved roads, it has been broken down. I want to continue my business by having it repaired". The total amount he is requesting is 1,000,000 MNT to replace the car motor.

loans.use: To replace the car motor

loans.name: Farhod

texts.ru: Фарход женат и на воспитании имеет троих детей. Его дети еще маленькие. Его родители также живут с ними. Жена занимается предоставлением услуги швеи. Он с детства увлекался растениеводством, и всегда хотел имеет свой участок  земли и выращивать сельхозпродукции. Пять лет назад он начал заниматься выращиванием сельхозпродуктов. На полученный доход он содержит свою семью, так как он старший сын в семье. Фарход хочет увеличить урожайность земли, и для этого ему нужны минеральные удобрения. На полученную прибыль он хочет построить дом для своей семьи. Фарход запрашивает займ для покупки семян, минеральных удобрений и горюче-смазочных материалов.
texts.en:
Farhod is married and is raising three children.  His children are still small.  His wife provides sewing services.  Farhod's parents live with him and his family.  Since he was a child he has been fascinated with horticulture and he always wanted to have his own piece of land where he could raise food crops.  Five years ago he began his farming business.  Since he is the oldest son, his income supports the whole family.  

Farhod would like to increase the productivity of his land, and he needs mineral fertilizers to do this.  He wants to build a house for the family with the profit he earns.  Farhod is requesting a loan for the purchase of seed, mineral fertilizers, and fuel and lubricants.

loans.use: to buy seed, mineral fertilizers, fuel and lubricants

loans.name: Purificacion

texts.es:
El señor Purificacion, tiene 33 años de edad, vive en una aldea de Intibucá, está casado desde hace 12 años y es padre de 3 hijos, quienes estudian en la escuela.

Don Purificacion, desde muy pequeño se ha dedicado a la agricultura, y hace aproximadamente 18 años que se dedica al cultivo de hortalizas como ser: zanahoria, cilantro, papas y frijoles, esta actividad es la única fuente de ingresos en la comunidad.
El ha solicitado varios préstamos a ODEF, con los que ha podido mejorar su nivel productivo. Actualmente está solicitando uno por 11,000 Lempiras para comprar semillas e insumos para el cultivo de hortalizas.
Su plan es que con la inversión va incrementar el nivel productivo y mejorar el nivel de vida de su familia.
texts.en:
Purificación, 33, lives in a village in Intibucá.  He’s been married for 12 years and is the father of three children who are attending school.

Purificación started working in agriculture when he was a little boy and for the last 18 years approximately has been growing vegetables like carrots, cilantro, potatoes and beans.  This activity is the community’s only source of income.

He has requested several loans from ODEF that have helped him improve his level of production.  He’s currently asking for an 11000 lempira loan to buy seeds and supplies for his vegetable crops.  His plan is that with the investment his productive level will increase and so will his family’s standard of living.

loans.use: to buy seeds and farm supplies.

loans.name: Jose Antonio

texts.es:
José Antonio  tiene 42 años de edad,  es casado y tiene 3 hijos de 19, 12 y 4 años de edad, vive con su familia en la ciudad de la Ceiba, Atlántida
Don José tiene un taller de soldadura. El trabaja en estructuras metálicas y soldadura en general. Aprendió a trabajar en este oficio porque siempre ha trabajado en talleres para otras personas. Pero desde hace 21 años se independizo y obtuvo su propio negocio. Donde manifiesta le ha ido muy bien y las ganancias que el ha obtenido y los prestamos que ODEF le ha otorgado ha  logrado levantar su negocio, también ha hecho mejoras en el local donde funciona para darle una mejor atención a los clientes que lo visitan. El trabaja todo el día en el taller.
Con este préstamo que solicita de 15,000 lempiras le ayudara para abastecerse de materiales para realizar los trabajos de soldadura  y seguir dando el servicio mejor que antes.
En el futuro piensa instalar otro taller en otro sector de la ciudad.
texts.en:
José Antonio, 42, is married and has three children who are 19, 12 and 4 years old.  He lives with his family in the city of La Ceiba, Atlántida.  José has a welding shop.  He works on metal structures and in general welding.  He learned to work in this occupation because he’s always worked for others in their shops but for the last 21 years has been independent and has had his own business wherein he states he’s done very well and the profits he’s earned and the ODEF loans he’s been granted have helped him raise up his business.
