He’s also made improvements to the locale where it operates to provide better service to the customers that call on him.

This 15000 lempira loan he’s requesting will help him stock up on materials to do his welding jobs and to continue giving still better service than before.  In the future he plans to open another shop in a different part of the city.

loans.use: to buy welding supplies.

loans.name: Marta Gloria

texts.es:
Marta, vive con sus dos hijos y su esposo, se dedica a la venta de semilla de marañón, este negocio lo aprendió por medio de unos vecinos y ya tiene 4 años de realizar esta actividad.
Ella está solicitando un préstamo para la compra de semilla de marañón cruda, para tener la suficiente disponibilidad para procesarla y generar más ventas.
El objetivo de Marta es mantener el negocio con la ayuda de los prestamos, ampliándose a otra zona, para crecer y mejorar sus ganancias.
texts.en:
Marta lives with her two children and her spouse. She earns her living selling the seeds of the fruit from the marañon tree, a food known in English as cashew nuts. She learned this business from some neighbors and now has 4 years of experience in this activity. 

She is requesting a loan with which to buy raw cashews, in order to process more seeds and generate more sales.

Marta's objective is to mantain her business with the aid of loans by expanding her sales area to include other localities, in order to grow her business and improve her earnings.

loans.use: to buy raw cashews "nuts" (the seeds of the marañon tree)

loans.name: Ana Beatriz

texts.es:
Ana, se dedica a la venta de calzado, vive con sus hijos de 6 y 8 años de edad, desde hace 8 años estar vendiendo calzado, lo inicio con el apoyo de su padre.
Ella está solicitando un préstamo para la compra de calzado, sandalias y zapatos formales, para damas y caballeros, este préstamo le ayudara a contar con más variedad y nuevos estilos, para seguir manteniendo a la clientela y atraer a nuevos.
Ella espera contar con este apoyo para crecer en el mercado, con la aspiración de poder tener un local propio.
texts.en:
Ana sells shoes. She lives with her children, who are six and eight years old. She started selling shoes eight years ago. She started her business with help from her father.
She is requesting a loan to purchase men’s and women’s tennis shoes, sandals, and formal shoes. The loan will help her to have more variety and newer styles so she can maintain her customer base and attract new ones.
She hopes to count on this support so her business can grow in the market, and she hopes to be able to have her own store.

loans.use: to purchase men’s and women’s tennis shoes, sandals, and formal shoes.

loans.name: Khvaen

texts.en:
Khvaen, 23, married, resides with her husband and one child in Siem Reap Province, Cambodia. She and her husband have been involved in growing agricultural crops and breeding pigs to sell for over two years, earning approximately USD 7 per day. 

In order to improve her business, Khvaen is requesting a loan of USD 1000 to purchase pig’s fodder rebuild her pig barn. This money will enable her get a bigger pig barn. 

In the future, she would like to expand her business and send her child to a good school.

loans.use: to purchase pig's fodder and rebuild her pig barn

loans.name: Saeng's Group

texts.en: As a widow of one child, Saeng supports her family by cultivating rice and growing gingers and taro. She is now 48 years old. Her son is still in school. Saeng has been with VisionFund since 2011. Now she is applying for a second loan from VisionFund after her first loan was completely repaid. She requested the loan to buy fertilizers and pesticides for her rice field and taro plant. She now leads a three-member loan group of all females. She hopes with the money from VisionFund, her crops yield can be increased so as to sell them in good price so that her family can live in a good condition and especially save money for her son’s higher education.

loans.use: To buy fertilizers and pesticides

loans.name: Bayarmagnai

texts.en: Bayarmagnai is a 27 years old woman who lives with her daughter, sister and parents in Dornod province in Eastern Mongolia. She has graduated from the college as an English translator. But, there was no opportunity in the town to find a job. Therefore, she started garment retailing business. She orders the products from Germany and the USA through the internet shops based on her English language. The business activity is going well and the customers appreciate the qualified products that she supplies. Bayarmagnai is a diligent woman who says that "I would like to expand the business activity by buying the supplies in large quantities so that I could raise the income." The total amount she is requesting is 3,000,000 MNT to buy garments.

loans.use: To buy garments

loans.name: Enhnaran

texts.en: Enhnaran is a 48 years old woman who lives with her husband and 2 children in Dornod province in Eastern Mongolia. Her husband is employed and the children study at the secondary school. She has started food retailing business in 1995. Since 2000, she has been running the business successfully. She trades vegetables like potato, onion, carrots, and cabbage. She is planning to increase the types of the products. Enhnaran is a smart woman who says that "I would like to develop the business activity by buying the supplies in large quantities and also purchasing the new types of vegetable". The total amount she is requesting is 300,000 MNT to buy more vegetables at whole sale prices.

loans.use: To buy more vegetables at wholesale prices

loans.name: Enhtsetseg

texts.en: Enhtsetseg is a 28 years old woman who lives with her daughter and parents in Dornod province in Eastern  Mongolia. Her daughter is 3 years old. Her husband is employed but works in the capital city. She has been running the business of garment retails since 2005, when she was a student. Since that time, she became financially independent, paid the college tuition fee by herself. She purchases and brings the products from China and trades them in a well- positioned shop counter of the town. Enhtsetseg is a intelligent woman who says that "I would like to develop the business activity by purchasing the products in wholesale so that I could save the transportation expenses and raise the income." The total amount she is requesting is 3,000,000 MNT to purchase garments from China.

loans.use: To purchase garments from China

loans.name: Purevdorj

texts.en: Purevdorj is a 23 years old man who lives with his wife and a son in Govi-Altai province in Southern Mongolia. His wife is unemployed but makes the traditional clothes at home. He has been making wooden products since 2007, when he was graduated the college. He is a professional person on the field and creates different kinds of products. He has been improving the household with the income from the business. Purevdorj is a hardworking man who says that "I would like to expand the business activity by making the workplace bigger than now so that I could continue the business in 4 seasons, not only in summer." The total amount he is requesting is 3,000,000 MNT to build the workplace bigger.

loans.use: To build the workplace bigger

loans.name: Khorn

texts.en:
Khorn, 50, is married, resides with her husband and four children in Siem Reap Province, Cambodia. She has been selling fish and groceries for over ten years, earning approximately USD 5 per day. Her husband is a palm sugar producer who earns about USD 5 per day. 

Due to the difficulty in the family’s transportation, Khorn is requesting a loan of USD 700 to purchase a motorbike to commute. This purchase would enable her to use the saved money on her transportation expenses to support the family. 

In the future, she would like to expand her business and help her children get bachelor’s degree. Moreover, she hopes to rebuild her present house to make it bigger and more comfortable for her family’s living.

loans.use: to purchase a motorbike to commute

loans.name: Christ Roi 2 Group

texts.fr: Le groupe CHRIST ROI 2 est composé de trois personnes qui vivent dans le même quartier et appartiennent à un même groupe de tontine. C'est la troisième fois que ce groupe sollicite l'aide financier de ALIDé, afin d'élever le niveau de leur activité. La représentante du groupe, du nom de Sènami Charlotte est celle qui a la main levée sur la photo. Sènami Charlotte est âgé de 33 ans et est mariée à un maçon du nom de Jean. Le couple a quatre enfants, tous scolarisés et à leur charge. Sènami Charlotte vit ensemble avec son mari et ses enfants. Les diverses charges de la maison sont assurées par le couple. Pour y parvenir, Sènami Charlotte exerce depuis près de huit ans la couture et vend de façon secondaire la friperie à son domicile. Sènami Charlotte s’approvisionne dans une ville du Benin. Dans la quête de la satisfaction de sa clientèle et pour accroître son chiffre d’affaires et son revenu, Sènami Charlotte sollicite, ensemble avec les autres membres du groupe CHRIST ROI 2, un troisième crédit auprès de ALIDé. Les crédits reçus antérieurement ont été bien remboursés.
texts.en:
The group CHRIST ROI 2 consists of three people who live in the same neighborhood and belong to the same savings group. This is the group’s third time seeking financial assistance from ALIDé to bolster their activities. The group’s representative is Sènami Charlotte, seen with her hand raised in the photo. Sènami Charlotte, age 33, is married to a mason named Jean. The couple have four dependent children who all go to school. 

Sènami Charlotte lives with her husband and children, and the couple handle the household responsibilities together. To that end, Sènami Charlotte started working as a seamstress nearly eight years ago. As a sideline, she sells second-hand clothing from her home. She buys her merchandise in a city of Benin.

To meet customer demand and to increase her sales and revenue, Sènami Charlotte is seeking a third loan from ALIDé together with the other members of the group CHRIST ROI 2. Past loans were repaid without incident.

loans.use: to buy second-hand clothing for resale.

loans.name: Rentsenzaya

texts.en: Rentsenzaya is a 49 years old woman who lives with her husband and 3 children in Dornod province in Eastern Mongolia. Her husband is employed. She has been running agriculture and fruits plantation business since 2000. She plants the fruits in summertime and vegetables in autumn and wintertime. She trades the vegetables at the shopcounter and the big exhibitions. She got a certificate of the best vegetable grower. Rentsenzaya is a diligent woman who says that "I would like to expand the business activity by buying the necessary seeds for the autumn plantation. Based on my 12 years of experience, she wants to develop the business more". The total amount she is requesting is 500,000 MNT to purchase the seeds.

loans.use: To purchase seeds

loans.name: Samba

texts.en: Samba is a 58 year old woman who lives with her grandson in Uvurhangai province in Central Mongolia. Since her daughter died, she left to live with her daughter's son. She started garment retails business in 2000. First, she used to be alone for the business, now she has 2 shop counters and employs 2 assistants there. She brings the supplies from China. She has expanded the business significantly in those years. Samba is a diligent woman who says that "I would like to expand the business activity by buying the supplies in large quantities to save the transportation expenses. I have a further plan to save for my grandson's future." The total amount she is re questing is 2,000,000 MNT to buy more garments.

loans.use: To buy more garments

loans.name: Lort

texts.en:
Lort, 39, is married, resides with her husband and five children in Siem Reap Province, Cambodia. She has been involved agricultural business for over ten years, has an extensive experience and is successful in her career. She is involved in growing agricultural crops and fattening up pigs. Her husband helps her run the business. Two of her children are construction workers who earn about USD 6 per day. 

Due to lack of funds, Lort is requesting a loan of USD 1000 to purchase maize seeds and fertilizer to start maize cultivation. 

In the future, she would like to expand her business and help her children get bachelor’s degrees. Moreover, she plans to build a new house next year.

loans.use: to purchase maize seeds and fertilizer to start maize cultivation

loans.name: Oeun

texts.en:
Oeun, a 50-year-old farmer living in Reussey Keo commune with her husband and six children, has been a rice farmer for 14 years. Her husband harvests and sells juice from palm trees for additional family income.

Oeun is now requesting a loan to buy a used motorcycle for family as well as business use. A client of HKL for three years, she has always repaid her previous loans in a timely fashion.

loans.use: to buy a used motorcycle.

loans.name: Buyantogtoh

texts.en:
Buyantogtoh is a 34-year-old man who lives with his wife and two children in the northern province, Uvs, Mongolia. His wife is unemployed and his children are 1 and 8 years old. 

He started a taxi service business five years ago. He has experience in the field and has an advantage of knowing the routes well. He drives not only to the capital city, but also to the neighbouring provinces. He takes good care of the customers and the van to meet the demand. 

Buyantogtoh is a polite and hardworking man who says, "I would like to improve the business activity by buying a new car. I am planning to replace the previous car with a good one." The total amount he is requesting is 1,800,000 MNT to buy a new car.

loans.use: to buy a new car.

loans.name: Sopheap

texts.en:
Sopheap, 31, resides with her husband and three children in Kampong Cham Province, Cambodia where she has been involved in growing rice and fattening cattle for over ten years, earning approximately USD 2 per day. Her husband is employed in a rubber plantation and earns about USD 5 per day.

In order to improve her family’s income, Sopheap is requesting a loan of USD 1000 to purchase rubber to resell. In the future, she would like to operate a rubber plantation and help each of her children get a bachelor's degree.

loans.use: to purchase rubber for resale.

loans.name: Elda Elena

texts.es:
Elda, vive en casa propia, con su esposo y tiene tres niños, ella administra una pupuseria de la cual se mantiene con su familia, este negocio lo inicio con la ayuda de su esposo, tiene un año de estar trabajándolo, lo atiende todos los días de la semana por las tardes.
Ella solicita un préstamo para la compra de una plancha para hacer pupusas, y además algunos ingredientes para preparar la venta como el aceite, maíz, quesillo y chicharrón. Esta inversión le ayudara para mejorar el negocio. 
Su objetivo es con el trabajo poderle dar a sus hijos una mejor vida, con la oportunidad de mejorar su futuro.
texts.en:
Elda lives in her own home with her husband and three children. She runs a pupusería, which is a food stand serving pupusas, corn tortillas stuffed with cheese, beans,  chicken or fried pork rind. She maintains the food stand with the help of her family. She started the business with the help of her husband. She has been working in the business for a year now, and tends to the business every day of the week during the afternoon.  

She is requesting a loan with which to buy a griddle on which to make pupusas. Additionally, she will use the loan to buy ingredients for the food she sells, such as oil, corn, cheese and fried pork skin. This investment will help her improve the business.

Her objective in her work is to be able to give her children a better life, with the opportunity to improve their prospects for the future.

loans.use: To buy a griddle on which she can prepare pupusas, thick corn tortillas stuffed with cheese, chicken, beans or fried pork skin.

loans.name: Chanthy's Group

texts.en:
As a 52-year-old mother of five children, Chanthy supports her family by cultivating a rice paddy and growing ginger. She lives in the Saang district. All of her five children are relying on the family. 

Chanthy has been with VisionFund since 2011 and recently she requested her second loan after the first one has been completely repaid. Now, she leads a loan group of two members, both of whom are female. 

Chanthy requested the loan to buy ginger seeds and gasoline for her water pump. With this loan, she hopes to increase her family's living standard by selling the ginger.

loans.use: to buy ginger seeds and gasoline for her water pump.

loans.name: Hum's Group

texts.en:
Hum, 37 years old, has been farming her one-hectare rice field and half-hectare vegetable farm for 12 years. A married mother of three children, all of whom are studying, she earns two US dollars per day and is able to save around one US dollar a day.

Now requesting her first loan from VisionFund to cultivate rice and vegetables, Hum hopes to sell her crops for a good price in order to support her children until they finish high school. Currently, Hum leads a loan group comprised of three members.

loans.use: to cultivate rice and vegetables.

location.town: Kampong Cham province, Tbaung Khmum district

loans.name: Pabla

texts.es:
La señora Pabla esta agradecida por su cooperación en el anterior crédito el cual lo utilizo para invertir en mercancía para su negocio de papelería escolar.
Esta solicitando un préstamo para la elaboración de un cuarto de madero y así ampliar más el local y poner la rentas de computadoras, ya que sus clientes le están solicitando este tipo de servicio. 
Doña Pabla es viuda y tiene dos hijos bajo su responsabilidad, un ya mayor de edad quien le ayuda con los gastos de la casa y la mas pequeña que esta en edad escolar. Desea que sus hijos tengan lo mejor. 
La señora Pabla quiere que su negocio tenga mas ganancias y ingreso a su familia, es por eso que solicita el préstamo para invertirle en su negocio.
texts.en:
Pabla is grateful for the help she received in the form of her previous loan. She invested that loan in merchandise for her school supply and stationery shop. 

She is requesting a loan for  the construction of a wooden room to be added to her site. In this way she will expand the size of her shop and will be able to add computer rentals, a service that her clients have been requesting. 

Pabla is a widow and remains responsible for her two children. One of her children is now a young adult and helps her with the household expenses. The younger of her two children is school-age. She wishes the best for her chlidren. 

Pabla wants her business to generate more earnings and more income for her family. For that reason, she is requesting the loan, in order to invest it in her business.

loans.use: To construct a room at the front of her home, in which she will expand her stationery shop.

loans.name: Saroeurn

texts.en:
Saroeurn, 38, is married and resides with her husband and five children in Kampong Cham Province, Cambodia. She has been involved in breeding pigs for over a year, earning approximately USD 3 per day. Her husband runs the business of purchasing junk materials to resell. He earns approximately USD 6 per day. 

In order to improve her family’s livelihood, Saroeurn wants to run an additional business. Therefore, Saroeurn requests a loan of USD 1,000 to rent farmland to start potato cultivation. This money will help her acquire security in the business. 

In the future, she would like to purchase a new motorbike for her husband to carry junk materials to sell and also would like to help her children get Bachelor’s degrees. Moreover, she hopes to rebuild her present house to make it more comfortable for her family’s living.

loans.use: to rent farmland to start potato cultivation.

loans.name: Chan Oun

texts.en:
Chan Oun, 44, is married and resides with her husband and three children in Takeo Province, Cambodia. She has been involved in growing rice and fattening up cattle for over twenty years, earning approximately USD 2 per day. Her husband is a traditional musician who can earn about USD 3 per day. Two of her children are employed. They are a garment worker and a motor mechanic. They earn about USD 9 per day. 

Due to the difficulty in the family’s transportation, Chan Oun is requesting a loan of USD 600 to purchase a motorbike to commute. This purchase would enable her to use the saved money on her transportation expenses to support the family. 

In the future, she would like to expand her business and build a new house.

loans.use: to purchase a motorbike to commute.

loans.name: Noemi Arely

texts.es:
Noemí, vive en casa propia, con su hija y su madre, se dedica a la venta de ropa, tiene 9 años de estar en el negocio, con el cual ha podido proveer para su familia todo lo necesario.
Ella está solicitando un nuevo préstamo para la compra de de más mercadería, como blusas, faldas, ropa interior, ropa de niño, este préstamo le ayudara a tener más variedad de productos y mejorar sus ventas.
La aspiración de Noemí es tener más mercadería disponible, surtido los estilos y poder tener un nuevo local.
texts.en:
Noemí lives in her own home with her mother and daughter.  She has been selling clothing for nine years and this business has enabled her to provide her family with everything they need. 
She is requesting a new loan to purchase additional merchandise such as blouses, skirts, children’s clothing, and undergarments.  This loan will enable her to stock a wider variety of merchandise and improve sales.  
Noemí’s aspires to have more merchandise available in assorted styles and to have a new location.

loans.use: to purchase blouses, skirts, undergarments, and children's clothing.

loans.name: Raul Mariano

texts.es:
Raúl, vive con su esposa y sus hijos, la vivienda es propia, desde hace tres años está en el negocio de la compra y venta de chatarra y productos reciclables, atiende todos los días.
El está solicitando un préstamo para la compra de productos para la venta, ya que recorre varias zonas para conseguir chatarra, latas, y otros materiales que se pueden reciclar, el los vende a un precio mayor, obteniendo un margen de ganancia.
La aspiración de Raúl es tener un vehículo propio para transportar los materiales, ya que abarcaria más zonas y con más capacidad para almacenar.
texts.en:
Raúl lives with his wife and children in his own home. For three years he has been working in his own business buying and selling scrap metal and recyclable materials. He tends to his business seven days a week. 

He is requesting a loan for the purchase of products he will later sell, since he travels through various local areas in order to buy scrap metal, cans and other materials that can be recycled. He then sells them at a higher price, earning a margin of profit. 

Raúl's aspiration is to have his own vehicle with which to transport the materials, since he would be able to cover more areas and would have the opportunity to store his materials.

loans.use: To buy scrap metal and cans.

loans.name: Osimjon

texts.ru: Осимчон женат и на воспитании имеет одного сына. Более одного года он занимается купле- продажей хозяйственных товаров. Имеет арендованный магазин в центре местного рынка. Приобретает товар в соседнем городе. В основном он продает мотопила, насосы и запчасти для мотопил. А также оборудование для строительства. Осимчон хотел бы получить займ для покупки хозтоваров с целью увлечения оборотного капитала.
texts.en: Osimjon is married and is raising a son.  For over a year he has been in the hardware business.  He has a rented store in the center of the local market.  He purchases his merchandise from a neighboring city.  He primarily sells power saws, their spare parts, and pumps.  He also sells building tools.  Osimjon would like to take out a loan for the purchase of hardware goods in order to expand his working capital.

loans.use: to buy hardware items in order to expand his business

loans.name: Carlos Alberto

texts.es:
Carlos, vive con su esposa y sus dos hijos de 10 y 7 años de edad, él se dedica a la venta y reparación de bicicletas, tiene 10 años en el negocio, este lo heredo de un tío.
Él está solicitando un préstamo  para la compra de repuestos en variedad para la reparación de las bicicletas, como pedales, cadenas, frenos, para mantener surtido el negocio y realizar los trabajos que los clientes necesiten. 
La aspiración de Carlos es crecer en clientela, tener mayor reconocimiento en la zona, ya que esto le permitirá tener un taller más rentable.
texts.en:
Carlos lives with his spouse and his two children, ages 10 and 7. He earns his living selling and repairing bicycles. He has been in this business for 10 years He inherited the business from an uncle. 

He is requesting a loan with which to buy a variety of replacement parts for bicycle repairs including pedals, chains and brakes, in order to keep the business well stocked so that he can carry out the repairs needed by his clients. 

Carlos' aspiration is to grow a client base and to be the best known bicycle shop in the area, which in turn will allow him to have a more profitable business.

loans.use: to buy replacement parts for bicycles.

loans.name: Kan

texts.en:
Kan, 57, is married and resides with her husband and three children in Takeo Province, Cambodia. She has been involved in growing rice and fattening up cattle for over twenty years, earning approximately USD 2 per day. Her husband runs the business of buying cattle to resell. He earns about USD 6 per day. Two of her children are employed. They are a garment construction worker and a motor taxi driver. They earn approximately USD 7 per day. 

In order to improve her family’s living conditions, Kan is requesting a loan of USD 800 to raise capital in her husband’s business for purchasing more cattle to resell. By doing so, he would be able to make more profit to support the family. 

In the future, she would like to expand her business and build a fence around her house.

loans.use: to raise capital in her husband's business for purchasing more cattle to resell.

loans.name: Amonullokhuja

texts.ru: Амонуллохуча женат и имеет одного сына. Более 8 лет занимается купле- продажей продуктов питания. В бизнесе помогают сын и жена. Его магазин находится около своего дома. Также  он занимается переработкой и реализацией сухофруктов. Помимо того он занимается скотоводством. У него много клиентов и его покупатели ценят его.  Имеет хорошую репутацию и кредитную историю. Амонуллохуча запрашивает займ для покупки продуктов питания с целью расширения бизнеса. А также на остальную сумму хочет закупить сухофруктов для реализации.
texts.en:
Amonullokhuja is married and is raising a son.  He has been selling groceries for over eight years.  His son and his wife help him with the business. His store is located near his house.  Amonullokhuja is also in the business of processing and selling dried fruit.  Besides this, he also raises cattle.  

He has many customers and they appreciate him.  He has a good reputation and a good credit history.  Amonullokhuja is requesting a loan for the purchase of grocery products in order to expand his business.  Additionally, with the remaining funds, he wants to buy dried fruit for resale.

loans.use: to buy grocery merchandise

loans.name: Claudia Yesenia

texts.es:
Claudia, vive con su esposo y un hijo de 2 años de edad, ella trabaja junto a su esposo en la agricultura, lo aprendió con sus padres, y tiene tres años de estar realizando sus propias siembras con el esposo para la alimentación de la familia.
Ella está solicitando un préstamo para la compra de 1000 plantas de chile y abono para aplicarlos a la plantación, este préstamo le ayudara para poder realizar la inversión necesaria en el cultivo.
El objetivo de Claudia es trabajar para salir adelante económicamente con su familia, con el trabajo agrícola para tener el sustento diario para su hogar.
texts.en:
Claudia lives with her husband and her 2 year old son. She works in agriculture with her husband. She learned farming from her parents. She has been supporting the family through her own harvests with her husband for 3 years.

She is requesting a loan for the purchase of 1000 chile plants and fertilizer she will apply to her crops. This loan will help her to be able to make the necessary investment in her crops. 

Claudia's objective is to move her family ahead economically by earning what she needs to sustain her family daily through her work in agriculture.

loans.use: To buy 1000 chile plants and fertilizer.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase sherbet, popsicles, and cones.

loans.name: Abdulrqib

texts.en:
Abdulrqib, aged 55, is a married man and has children aged 25 and 28 years who live together in Sana`a, Yemen. He dreams of seeing them become successful individuals. 

He has been operating a laundry for many years. Initially he only had a small amount of working capital with which to make volume purchases, earn discounts and respond to his customers in a timely manner. Then his business became more profitable bit by bit, because he gradually expanded his business by purchasing laundry machines in order to offer good service for his customers. He has a lot of experience washing and ironing clothes. 

He is currently applying for a loan of 300,000 Yemeni Rial (YER) from AMB to buy a new steam iron for his business. In the future, he would like to expand his business to open other laundries.

loans.use: to buy a new steam iron for his business.

loans.name: Joni

texts.en:
Joni, a 26-year-old man, is married and blessed with two children, named Tanto, 3, and Nancy, 2. Joni is a cattle supplier. He has been running the business for six years. Every week Joni seeks the best cattle in the local market and buys them from the trader to be resold. 

Joni partners with his brother in running the business so they usually share the income earned. Joni was thinking to get more cattle for his own business. He plans to save money for his wife's maternity cost. Therefore he submitted a loan application to TLM and requested a loan of 10,000,000 Rupiah (IDR). The loan will be spent on three cattle.

loans.use: to purchase 3 cattle

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: To buy summer blouses, shorts, sandals, etc.

loans.name: Ines

texts.es:
Inés, vive con su esposo y sus tres hijos,  ella se dedica a la venta de tortillas, pupusas, y una tienda de productos domésticos, ella aprendió este oficio en su familia, tiene 12 años de estar realizándolo, ya que es una ayuda para las necesidades del hogar.
Ella está solicitando un préstamo para la compra de maíz, leña, chicharrón, aceite, quesillo, pastas, gaseosas, boquitas, detergentes, este préstamo le ayudara para surtir todo el negocio, teniendo la materia prima para la tortillas, las pupusas, y algunos productos para la tienda, mejorando la producción y los ingresos.
El objetivo de Inés, es ampliar el negocio de la tienda, mejorar el local donde tiene la mercadería, agregar otros productos para llamar más clientes.
texts.en:
Inés lives with her husband and her three children. She earns her living selling tortillas and pupusas (tortillas stuffed with chicken, cheese, beans or fried pork rind) and running a small store where she sells household products. She learned the business from her family. She has been running this business for 12 years, since it helps her to provide for her household.  

She is requesting a loan with which to buy corn, firewood, fried pork skin, oil, pasta, soft drinks, snack foods and detergents. This loan will help her to stock her entire business, so that she will have the raw materials for her tortillas and her pupusas, as well as some products for her store. That will allow her to improve her production and her earnings. 

Inés' objective is to expand her store, to improve the site where she offers the household products and to offer additional products in order to attract more clients. 

.

loans.use: To buy corn, firewood, fried pork skin, oil, cheese, pasta and soft drinks.

loans.name: Yem's Group

texts.en: Yem, a 47-year-old mother of two, has been farming for twenty years to support her family. She and her family live in a wooden house in a rural area of Tbaung Khmum district. After expenses, they can save only half a US dollar per day. This is her first loan with VisionFund. She requested the loan from VisionFund to cultivate a rice field. Yem now leads a loan group of two female members. She hopes that this loan will enable her to make more income so that she can keep her children in school until they finish high school.

loans.use: To cultivate a rice field

location.town: Kampong Cham province, Tbaung Khmum district

loans.name: Phavy

texts.en:
Phavy, 48, is married, and resides with her husband and four children in Takeo Province, Cambodia. She has been involved in growing her agricultural business for over ten years, has extensive experience, and is successful in her career. She is involved in growing rice and fattening cattle.  She earns approximately $2 per day. Her husband is a driver who earns about $4 per day. 

Due to her current income being low, Phavy is requesting a loan of $1200 US to purchase a tuk tuk (a motorcycle-based taxi) for her husband to run a taxi service. This purchase would enable him to earn more income to support the family. 

In the future, she would like to run a grocery store at home and help her youngest son get a bachelor's degree. Moreover, she hopes to rebuild her present house to make it bigger and more convenient, improving her family's living conditions.

loans.use: to purchase a tuk tuk for her husband to run a taxi service

loans.name: Faustino

texts.es:
Faustino, es agricultor, vive con su esposa  y un nieto de 15 años, Faustino está dedicado a la siembra de hortalizas, tiene más de 20 años en el oficio, produciendo tomates, pepino, chile, maíz, ejotes, frijoles, trabaja a tiempo completo.
Él esta solicitando un préstamo para la compra de semilla de tomate, chile, pepino, ejote, abono, para poder iniciar el cultivo, con la intención de que este préstamo le ayude para incrementar su cosecha.
La aspiración de don Faustino es apoyar con su trabajo a la superación de su nieto, para que pueda prepararse profesionalmente.
texts.en: Faustino lives with his wife and fifteen year old grandson.  He is a farmer with more than twenty years of experience.  He works full time growing vegetables such as tomatoes, cucumbers, chili peppers, corn, string beans, and other beans.  He is requesting the loan to purchase tomato, chili, cucumber, and string bean seeds as well as fertilizer to begin planting and hopes that this loan will help him increase his harvest. Faustino’s goal is to work to support his grandson so that he can prepare for a professional career.

loans.use: to purchase tomato, chili, cucumber, and string bean seeds as well as fertilizer.

loans.name: Mahugnon 22 Group

texts.fr: MAHUGNON 22 est un groupe constitué de trois personnes qui résident dans le même quartier  et dont la représentante (celle qui a la main levée sur la photo) se nomme Madeleine. Dans le but d’augmenter leur fonds de roulement, ce groupe sollicite pour la troisième fois, un crédit auprès de ALIDé. Madeleine est âgée 39 ans et est une veuve. Madeleine a neuf enfants à sa charge dont trois représentent ses propres enfants. Tous les enfants sont scolarisés. Madeleine vit seule avec ses enfants et assure seule les charges de la maison. Madeleine n’a jamais été à l’école.  Pour satisfaire ses besoins et ceux de ses enfants, Madeleine vend de l’igname frits et des beignets à son domicile. De façon secondaire, Madeleine vend des couches depuis près de vingt ans. Madeleine s’approvisionne dans une ville du Benin. Ce prêt permettra certainement à  Madeleine et à son groupe MAHUGNON 22, de rehausser le niveau de leur activité et d’accroître leur clientèle et leur revenu. Les crédits reçus antérieurement ont été bien remboursés.
texts.en:
MAHUGNON 22 is a group made up of three people who live in the same neighborhood.  Madeleine, the group's representative, is the woman raising her hand in the photo.  In order to increase its working capital, the group is requesting its third loan from ALIDé.

Madeleine is 39 years old and a widow.  She has nine children in her care, three of whom are her own children.  All the children attend school.  Madeleine lives alone with her children and takes care of the household expenses alone.  She has never attended school.

In order to provide for herself and her children, Madeleine sells fried yams and fritters from home.  Additionally, she has also been selling baby diapers for almost twenty years.  Madeleine stocks up in a town in Benin.  

This loan will certainly help Madeleine and her group, MAHUGNON 22, to boost their activity level, increase their customer base and their income.  Previous loans have been well repaid.

loans.use: To buy yams and baby diapers.

loans.name: Ana Lisbeth

texts.es: Ana es originaria de León, de 31 años de edad, de oficio comerciante en el negocio de comideria, madre de 2 hijos los cuales están a su cargo. Ella inicio su actividad ayudándole a su mama en lo que es la elaboración de la comida luego decidió independizarse poniendo su propio negocio de comida desde hace 5 años recibiendo siempre el apoyo de su mama ya que cocinan las dos, sus productos los comercializa en su comunidad y con la gente que circulan por la zona que se detienen a probar sus platillos. Cuenta con otros ingresos pues recibe remesas de parte de su compañero de vida. Solicita el préstamo para comprar plátanos, pollo, carne, repollo asi como todos los insumos  necesarios para la elaboración de sus comidas ya que este le ayudara para contar con una reserva debido a que los precios de los productos cada día van subiendo aun más.
texts.en:
Ana, 31, is from León.  She is a storekeeper by trade, in the food business.  She is the mother of two children, for whom she is responsible.

She started her business helping her mother make food.  Then she decided to work on her own, setting up her own food business five years ago and always receiving her mother's help because both of them cook.  She sells her products in her community and to the people who walk around the area and stop to try her dishes.  She has other income because she receives remittances from her life partner.

She is requesting the loan to buy bananas, chicken, meat, and cabbage as well as all the ingredients necessary to make her dishes.  This will help her have a reserve because the prices of the products keep going up even more every day.

loans.use: to buy bananas, chicken, meat, and cabbage.

loans.name: Homadi

texts.en:
Homadi, 38, is a married man with three children. He lives in Sana'a, Yemen where he works selling chicken. The idea for the business came 14 years ago, when he acquired much experience. When he went off on his own to earn income, he did not think of anything but to start a micro business dedicated to selling chicken. His business is located in a strategic center – a very busy commercial area. In his business selling chicken, he has become known for good customer service. This has permitted him to have a large clientele and guaranteed good sales. Because of this, his business has grown little by little. 

Homadi is currently asking for a loan of 150,000 Yemeni rials from AMB in order to buy a chicken skinning machine. He wants to offer better variety to his customers and thus increase his sales. He hopes that in this way his business will continually capitalize itself and his earnings increase. Homadi hopes that with more income his family can enjoy a better quality of life and have better economic opportunities.

loans.use: to buy a chicken skinning machine for his business

loans.name: Agbondjedo Group

texts.fr: Le groupe AGBONDJEDO est composé de trois personnes qui sont des amies et appartiennent à un même groupe de tontine. C'est la cinquième fois que ce groupe sollicite l'aide financier de ALIDé, afin d'élever le niveau de son activité. La représentante du groupe, du nom de Jeanne est celle qui a la main levée sur la photo. Jeanne est âgée de 45 ans et vit au Bénin. Jeanne n’a pas fréquenté l’école. Jeanne est mariée à un certain Kinvoédo. Le couple a quatre enfants, tous scolarisés et à leur charge. Jeanne vit ensemble avec son mari et ses enfants et assure ensemble avec son mari les diverses charges de la maison. Afin de subvenir à ses besoins, Jeanne mène comme activité depuis quinze ans, la vente de d’oignon, de piment et de façon secondaire la vente d’ignames dans un marché du Benin. Jeanne s’approvisionne dans une ville du Bénin. Dans la quête de la satisfaction de sa clientèle et pour accroître son chiffre d’affaires et son revenu, Jeanne sollicite ensemble avec les autres membres du groupe AGBONDJEDO, un cinquième crédit auprès de ALIDé. Les prêts reçus antérieurement ont été bien remboursés.
texts.en:
AGBONDJEDO is a group made up of three people who are friends and belong to the same savings group.  It is the fifth time that the group is requesting financial assistance from ALIDé, in order to raise its level of activity.

Jeanne, the group's representative, is the woman raising her hand in the photo.  She is 45 years old, lives in Benin, and has never attended school.  She is married to a man named Kinvoédo.  The couple has four children, all in school and all their dependents.  Jeanne lives with her husband and children and takes care of the various household expenses with her husband. In order to provide for herself, Jeanne has been selling onions, peppers, and to a lesser extent, yams, at a market in Benin for the past fifteen years.  She stocks up in a town in Benin.

In order to meet her customers' needs and to increase her turnover and income, Jeanne is requesting a fifth loan from ALIDé, together with the other members of the AGBONDJEDO group.  Previous loans have been well repaid.

loans.use: to buy bags of onions, yams and peppers.

loans.name: Berthi

texts.en:
Berthi is a 37-year-old single lady. She is living with her father and cousins. She is the breadwinner in her family and is responsible for taking care of her father and covering her cousin’s schooling fees. Therefore, Berthi runs a kiosk business. She has been running the kiosk business for years.

To generate more income, Berthi plans to expand her kiosk business with more stock. Berthi got information that TLM provides loans for those who have small businesses. She then submitted a loan application and requested a loan of 4,500,000 Indonesian rupiah from TLM. She would like to spend the loan on kiosk stock such as soft drinks, snacks and nine daily basic items. She is expecting the loan to help her generate a better income for her family.

loans.use: to purchase kiosk stock such as soft drinks, snacks and nine daily basic items

loans.name: Vanh

texts.en:
Vanh, 51, is married and lives with her husband and three children in Takeo province, Cambodia. She has been growing rice and fattening up cattle for over 20 years, earning approximately $2 US per day. Her husband is a farm worker who earns about $3 US per day. Two of her children are garment workers. They earn about $6 US per day. 

In order to improve her family’s livelihood, Vanh is requesting a loan of $800 US to purchase cattle to raise and resell at a profitable price when they gain weight. By doing so, she will generate more profit to support the family. In the future, she would like to expand her business and help her youngest son get a bachelor’s degree. Moreover, she hopes to rebuild her present house to make it bigger and more comfortable for her family’s living conditions.

loans.use: to purchase cattle to resell at a profitable price when they gain weight

loans.name: Met's Group

texts.en: Met, age 38, is a mother of three children, all of them still in school. Her family has been farming for 17 years.  They live in a wooden house and are now able to save up enough money to build a proper house. Having received two previous loans from VisionFund, Met is now requesting another loan to cultivate rice and vegetables on her 2 hectares of land. She now leads a loan group of three female members. The loan will help to generate more income to sufficiently support her family and to set aside money for her children to finish their studies.

loans.use: To cultivate rice and vegetables

location.town: Kampong Cham province, Tbaung Khmum district

loans.name: Ivania Del Socorro

texts.es:
Ivania de 51 años de edad es originaria de León, realizo estudios de  Licenciatura en Enfermería, soltera, de oficio comerciante, madre de  3 hijos los cuales todos tienen vida independiente. Ella se dedica a la venta de ropa usada actividad que la inicio desde hace más de 6 años con esfuerzo propio, comercializa sus  productos en su misma comunidad y en los alrededores de la zona contando solo con esos ingresos, recibe el apoyo de sus hijos en sus tiempos libres, sus expectativas son comercializar sus productos siempre en la misma zona y contar con variedades de ropa para tener diferentes productos que ofrecerles a sus clientes.
Realiza el préstamo para invertir más en el negocio en la compra de camisas, pantalones, shorts y calzados para ambos sexos con el objetivo de obtener más ingresos. Este le ayudara ya que podrá comprar mas productos para su clientela, como  planes futuros espera llegar a superarse aun más tratando de mantener su negocio siempre surtido con ropa y calzado.
texts.en:
Ivania, 51, is from León.  She is single and the mother of three children who live independently.  She studied for a degree in nursing.

She is a storekeeper by trade and works selling used clothing, an activity she started more than six years ago on her own.  She sells her products in her own community and on the outskirts of the area.  She has only this income.  She receives help from her children in their spare time.  Her expectations are to always sell her products in the same area and to have a variety of clothing to have different products to sell to her customers.

She is requesting a loan to invest more in her business buying shirts, pants, shorts, and footwear for both sexes, with the goal of getting more income.  This will help her because she will be able to buy more products for her customers.  Her plan for the future is to improve herself even more, always trying to keep her business stocked with clothing and footwear.

loans.use: to buy shirts, pants, shorts, and footwear for both sexes.

loans.name: Rufino Antonio

texts.es: Rufino de 42 años de edad es originario de León, de oficio comerciante, padre de 7 hijos de los cuales solo dos están a su cargo ya que los otros son mayores de edad  tienen vida independiente. El se dedica a uno de las actividades más conocida en nuestro país como es la pesca   trabajo que inicio desde los 12 años de edad ya que su papa también era pescador ahora cuenta con 30  años de realizar esta actividad siendo este su primer negocio, sus productos los comercializa en su misma comunidad recibiendo el apoyo de su esposa, sus expectativas es llegar a tener sus propias herramientas de trabajo. Solicita el préstamo para la compra de un freezer ya que este le servirá para el almacenamiento de pescado y poder vender un nuevo producto, sus planes futuros es crecer en su negocio para poner una pulpería.
texts.en: Rufino is 42 and is from León.  He owns a small business.  He is the father of 7 children, only 2 of whom are under his care.  The others are adults and have independent lives.  He makes a living through one of the most-known activities in our country, which is fishing.  He started this work when he was 12 since his father was also a fisherman.  He has now been doing this for 30 years, and this is his first business.  He sells his products in his own community with the help of his wife.  His expectations are to have his own work tools.  He is requesting this loan to buy a freezer since this will help him store his fish and be able to sell a new product.  His future plans are to grow in his business and to start a small grocery store.

loans.use: to buy a freezer.

loans.name: Sarath

texts.en:
Sarath, 40, is married and resides with her husband and three children in Takeo Province, Cambodia. She is a homemaker. Her husband is a construction worker who earns about US $5 per day. One of her children is a construction worker as well and he earns about US $3 per day. 

In order to improve her family’s economy, Sarath is requesting a loan of US $1,300 to purchase groceries to resell at home. In the future, she would like to build a new house and help her children get their bachelor’s degrees.

loans.use: to purchase groceries to resell at home

loans.name: Pov's Group

texts.en: Pov, a 43-year-old married mother of three girls, is now the leader of a loan group of two female members who live in a rural area of Kompong Cham province. Pov, after completely repaying her first loan, has requested another loan from VisionFund to buy fertilizers and rice seeds and to cultivate her rice farmland. With this loan, she hopes to increase her crop yield and therefore earn more income to expand her business, build on some savings and build a proper house for the family. Before the loan from VisionFund, Pov’s business usually met difficulties such as natural disasters and insufficient investment.

loans.use: To buy fertilizers and rice seeds and to cultivate rice

location.town: Kampong Cham province, Prey Chhor district

loans.name: Savoeurn

texts.en:
Savoeurn, 38, is married and resides with her husband and four children in Prey Veng Province, Cambodia. She and her husband have been running a business providing make up services and costumes for wedding ceremonies for over ten years, earning approximately US $15 per day. Her husband is also a photographer who earns about US $5 per day. Two of Savoeurn's children are employed in a garment factory, earning approximately US $5 per day. 

In order to improve her business, Savoeurn is requesting a loan of US $1,500 to purchase more cosmetics and costumes to use in her business. This purchase would enable her to provide new and fashionable clothes to her clients. 

In the future, Savoeurn would like to expand her business and help her children get bachelor’s degrees. Moreover, she hopes to rebuild her present house to make it more convenient for her family’s living conditions.

loans.use: to purchase more cosmetics and costumes to use in her business

loans.name: Oluwatobi Group

texts.fr: OLUWATOBI est un groupe constitué de cinq personnes qui sont des amies et qui résident dans le même quartier. La représentante de ce groupe (celle qui a la main levée sur la photo) se nomme Djoba Zinhoué. Dans le but d’augmenter leur fonds de roulement, ce groupe sollicite pour la quatrième fois, un crédit auprès de ALIDé. Djoba Zinhoué est âgée de 33 ans et est mariée à un certain Nicaise. Le couple a trois enfants, tous scolarisés et à leur charge.  Djoba Zinhoué n’a pas fréquenté l’école. Djoba Zinhoué vit ensemble avec son mari et ses enfants et assure ensemble avec son mari les diverses charges de la maison. Pour satisfaire ses besoins et ceux de sa famille, Djoba Zinhoué vend des assiettes et de façon secondaire des amuse-gueules de façon ambulante depuis près de huit ans. Djoba Zinhoué s’approvisionne dans un marché du Benin. Ce quatrième prêt permettra à Djoba Zinhoué et aux autres membres du groupe OLUWATOBI de rehausser le niveau de leur activité et d’accroître leur clientèle et leur revenu. Les trois prêts consentis antérieurement ont été bien remboursés.
texts.en:
OLUWATOBI is a group made up of five people who are friends and live in the same neighborhood.  Djoba Zinhoué, the group's representative, is the woman raising her hand in the photo. In order to increase its working capital, the group is requesting its fourth loan from ALIDé.

Djoba Zinhoué is 33 years old and married to a man named Nicaise.  The couple has three children, all in school and all their dependents.  Djoba Zinhoué has never attended school.

Djoba Zinhoué lives with her husband and children and takes care of the various household expenses with her husband.  In order to provide for herself and her family, she has been selling plates and, to a lesser extent, snacks, for almost eight years.  She stocks up at a market in Benin and sells door-to-door. 

This fourth loan will help Djoba Zinhoué and the other members of the OLUWATOBI group to boost their level of activity, increase their customer base and their income. The three loans previously granted to them have been well repaid.

loans.use: to buy kitchen utensils and snacks.

loans.name: Sokha

texts.en:
Sokha, 49, is married and resides with her husband and four children in Prey Veng Province, Cambodia. She and her husband have been involved in growing rice and fattening cattle for over 20 years, earning approximately US $13 per day. Two of her children are garment workers who earn about US $5 per day.

Sokha wants to build a new house, and is requesting a loan of US $800 to purchase timber to construct it. This purchase will enable her to provide a convenient house for her family to live in. In the future, Sokha would like to purchase more farmland to expand her agricultural business and help her children get bachelor’s degrees.

loans.use: to purchase timber to construct a new house

loans.name: Julieta

texts.en:
Julieta runs an agricultural business in the village of Tsovagyugh, in the Sevan area. She and her husband breed cows, sheep and chickens, and are engaged in bee-keeping. Julieta sells the milk to a dairy company and the meat to a butcher shop. She says that bee-keeping takes a lot of work and time but she likes to produce a high quality honey for her family. Sometimes she sells some of the honey to her neighbors, as well. Thanks to their agricultural business, Julieta and her husband provide for their family.

Julieta is 55 years old. Her children are married adults and live separately from their parents. Julieta is seeking a 350.000 AMD loan to buy a large lot of fodder for her farm animals.

loans.use: to buy a large lot of fodder for her farm animals

loans.name: Samoeurn

texts.en:
Samoeurn, 62, is widowed and resides with two children in Prey Veng Province, Cambodia. She has been involved in growing rice and fattening cattle for over 20 years, earning approximately US $3 per day. Two of her children are employed as a construction worker and a motor taxi driver, earning approximately US $5 per day. 

Due to the family's transportation difficulties, Samoeurn has requested a loan of US $1,500 to purchase a motorbike to commute. This purchase would enable her to use the saved money from her transportation expenses to support the family. In the future, Samoeurn would like to run a motor repair shop for her son and build a new house.

loans.use: to purchase a motorbike to commute

loans.name: Kenia Patricia

texts.es:
Kenia de 21 años de edad  originaria de León,  es una joven que a su corta edad  ya se dedica al oficio comerciante tiene como negocio un restaurante de comidas caseras ubicado cerca de la playa, soltera, transcursa sus estudios universitarios. Inicio su actividad desde hace 2 años cuando la mama le heredo un rancho para la venta de comidas ricas ya que la mama siempre a tenido negocio cerca de la playa, en el negocio recibe el apoyo de su mama que le ayuda en la elaboración de las comidas, sus expectativas son crecer en el negocio hasta llegar acondicionarlo para darle una mejor vista.
Kenia solicita el préstamo para comprar insumos como pescados, granos básicos como arroz, harina,  aceite, entre otros. Este crédito le será de mucha ayuda pues podrá comprar los productos que sean de mayor venta en la época, sus planes futuros es hacer del negocio un lugar turístico porque se considera una joven con perspectivas de negocio.
texts.en:
Kenia is 21 and is from León.  She is a young woman, who at her young age, already has a small business of a restaurant near the beach where she sells homemade food.  She is single and is studying in college.  She started her business 2 years ago when her mother gave her a small hut to make delcious food.  Her mother has always had a business near the beach.  She has the help of her mother in preparing food.  Her expectations are to grow in her business until she can fix it up to make it look better.

Kenia is requesting the loan to buy supplies like fish, basic grains like rice, flour, oil, etc.  This loan will help her a lot because she will be able to buy the products that sell the most during this season.  Her future plans are to make her business a tourist attraction because she considers herself to be a young woman with a good sense of business.

loans.use: to buy supplies like fish, basic grains like rice, flour, oil, etc.

loans.name: Sor's Group

texts.en:
As a mother of two, Sor supports her family by farming. She also raises pigs to generate additional income. She lives in a wooden house in a rural area of Preahnet Preah district.

Sor has been with VisionFund since 2011 and has regularly repaid her obligations. She has now requested another loan to cultivate her rice paddy and to buy fertilizers and pig feed. She hopes that this loan will help her to increase her crop yields and to have her pigs grow healthily so that she can sell them for a good price, which would enable her to earn more income to sufficiently feed her family. Sor is now the leader of a loan group of four members.

loans.use: To cultivate the rice paddy and to buy fertilizers and pig feed

location.town: Banteay Meanchey Province, Preahnet Preah district

loans.name: Touch

texts.en:
Touch, 51, is widowed and resides with two children in Kandal Province, Cambodia. She has been involved in growing rice and fattening cattle for over 20 years. She also sells Khmer noodles at home to generate extra income to support the family. Touch earns approximately US $5 per day. Two of her children are employed and earn US $6 per day. 

In order to improve her family’s livelihood, Touch is requesting a loan of US $800 to purchase rice seeds to start rice cultivation. In the future, she would like to expand her business and rebuild her present house to make it more comfortable for her family’s living.

loans.use: to purchase rice seeds to start rice cultivation

loans.name: Phat

texts.en:
Phat, 38, is married and resides with her husband and six children in Kandal Province, Cambodia. She and her husband have been involved in an agricultural business for over 20 years, have extensive experience and are successful in their careers. They grow rice and fish, earning approximately US $5 per day. Four of Phat's children are employed as construction and garment workers, earning about US $12 per day. 

Due to the family's transportation difficulties, Phat is requesting a loan of US $1,200 to purchase a motorbike to commute. This purchase would enable Phat to use the saved money from her transportation expenses to support the family. In the future, she would like to purchase more farmland to expand her business and to help her children get bachelor’s degrees.

loans.use: to purchase a motorbike to commute

loans.name: Santa Veronica

texts.es:
Santa es un ejemplo de mujer luchadora que ha dado todo de sí por el bienestar de su familia, ella y su esposo siempre están pendientes del buen estado de su pequeño de 6 años, al cual aman y cuidan mucho. Santa disfruta mucho tejiendo chompas, ya que realiza bonitos y nuevos diseños exclusivos para su pequeño.

Santa de dedica a manejar moto taxi desde hace 2 años, tiempo en el que ha aprendido, con algunas dificultades, las rutas para los destinos a los que desean acudir sus clientes. Ella trabaja a partir de las 7 de la mañana, ya que es en esas primeras horas donde la cantidad de sus clientes se incrementa, y ya es a las 8 y 30 de la noche, cuando puede regresar a casa con el dinero suficiente para los alimentos diarios de sus pequeños.

Actualmente ella necesita hacer un reforzamiento mas el pintado de la parte base de la moto con el fin de que se encuentre en mejor estado y de esa manera pueda visitar mayor cantidad de clientes y transportarlos a zonas más alejadas, con este apoyo, ella podrá incrementar sus ingresos y a su vez su calidad de vida, lo que la llevará a motivarse mucho más y cumplir con su gran sueño: “Mejorar su vivienda y contar con nuevas movilidades “
texts.en:
Santa is an example of a hardworking women who has given all of herself for her family's well-being. She and her husband are always watching out for their 6 year old son's health, and they love him and care for him a lot. Santa likes knitting sweaters because she makes new and beautiful designs especially for her son.

Santa has been driving a mototaxi for 2 years, during which time she has learned - with some difficulty - the routes for all of the places that her customers want to go. She starts work at 7am because in the morning she has more customers; she is able to return home at 8:30 pm with enough money to pay for her son's food. 

Right now she needs to reinforce and paint the base of the mototaxi so that it will be in better shape and she will be able to handle more customers and take them to farther destinations. With this support, she will be able to increase her income and her quality of life, which will motivate her more and help her to achieve her dream: "improving her home and giving her greater mobility."

loans.use: to reinforce and paint the base of her mototaxi.

loans.name: Phalla's Group

texts.en:
Phalla, age 41, is married and the mother of three. To support her family, Phalla has worked as a farmer for 20 years. She supplements her income by selling fish. She and her two group loan members are villagers in the Mongkol Borei district.

Phalla has regularly repaid her previous three loans to VisionFund. She has now requested another loan of US $250 to cultivate her rice farm and to buy fish for resale. Phalla hopes that this loan will enable her to generate more income to provide her family with sufficient food and household equipment and to buy more land for farming.

loans.use: To cultivate the rice field and to buy fish for resale

location.town: Banteay Meanchey Province, Mongkol Borey District

loans.name: Liz Miriam

texts.es:
Liz, una mujer de 26 años de edad tiene un pequeño de 4 años, al cual saca adelante vendiendo ropa para adultos y niños de forma ambulatoria. Liz ha enfrentado los fuertes temblores y lluvias que han originado algunos problemas ligeros en su vivienda, pero que con mucha dedicación y fuerza ha aprendido a poder superarlos.

Liz se levanta diariamente muy temprano con el fin de atender bien a su pequeño, antes de ir a vender, su trabajo consiste en caminar e ir visitando a las personas que viven en las zonas en donde vende sus productos. Ella siempre ha deseado salir adelante por ella y su pequeño, el cual es su principal motivo.

Actualmente sus clientes se han incrementado un poco debido a que con la nueva temporada escolar, los padres necesitan algunas prendas para sus pequeños.

Con un poco de ayuda, Liz podrá comprar ropa nueva ( Pantalones, polos, blusas, etc.), lo que le permitirá generar mayores ingresos y poco a poco cumplir su gran sueño “Tener un nuevo negocio y tener un local en el mercado”, lugar en el que se generan la mayoría de sus ventas.
texts.en:
Liz is a 26-year-old woman and has a 4-year-old son, of whom she takes good care by selling clothing for adults and children by traveling around to make her sales.  Liz has experienced the strong earthquakes and rains that have caused slight problems in her home.  But with a lot of dedication and strength, she has learned to be able to overcome them.

Liz gets up very early every day with the aim of taking good care of her son before she goes out to make her sales.  Her job consists of walking and going to visit people that live in the areas where she sells her products.  She has always desired to get ahead for herself and her son, which is her main motivation.

Currently, her customers have increased a little because of the new school season.  Parents need clothing for their children.

With a little help, Liz will be able to buy new clothing (pants, polo shirts, blouses, etc.), which will let her generate more income.  Little by little, she will fulfill her big dream, "to have a new business and to have a location in the market," a place where she generates the majority of her sales.

loans.use: to buy new clothing (pants, polo shirts, blouses, etc.).

loans.name: Josue Daniel

texts.es:
Josue es un hombre de 24 años que día a día se esfuerza mucho para poder salir adelante y demostrarse a sí mismo que puede lograr grandes cosas. A través de estos años ha afrontado distintos retos, entre ellos la separación con la madre de su pequeño de 2 años y a su vez los frecuentes temblores y lluvias que han afectado grandes partes de las ciudades.

Para poder generar los ingresos necesarios para sus necesidades básicas, se dedica a la venta de mallas, fardos y conos para la cobertura y embalaje de productos agrícolas, actualmente se está dedicando a este negocio 8 horas diarias, desde muy temprano, ya que los compradores suelen visitarlo a tempranas horas.

Con un poco de ayuda, Josue podrá comprar mallas, fardos y los conos que necesita debido a que es en estos meses, donde sus clientes se incrementan por la temporada de cosecha. De esta manera desea poder incrementar sus ingresos y con el tiempo ampliar su negocio para así iniciarse en el negocio de transporte de carga, lo que hará que mejore la calidad de vida de su pequeño como también la suya.
texts.en:
Josue is a man of 24, who day after day does his very best to succeed and prove to himself that he can achieve great things. He has faced various challenges through the years, including a separation from the the mother of his small 2-year-old son, and at the same time, the frequent tremors and rains that have affected large parts of the cities. 

In order to generate the income necessary for his basic needs, he sells plastic sheeting, baling material, and bag-closing thread, for covering and packaging agricultural products. Currently, he is working eight hours a day in this business, from early in the morning, as his buyers usually visit him at an early hour of the day. 

With a bit of help, Josue will be able to buy the plastic sheeting, baling material, and bag-closing thread he needs. This is due to the fact that it is in these months, that the number of his customers increases because of the harvest season. In this way, he wishes to increase his income, and in time expand his business to start a freight transportation business, which he will do to improve his quality of life and that of his small son.

loans.use: To buy plastic sheeting, baling material, and bag-closing thread, for covering and packaging agricultural products.

loans.name: Mercedes

texts.es:
Mercedes tiene 58 años de edad, vive junto a su esposa en casa propia, tiene 02 hijos que mantiene. Él vive en la zona del Caserío Las Juntas en el distrito de Pacora y cuenta con servicios de  luz y agua en su domicilio. El lugar donde vive es una comunidad pequeña con un aproximado de 200  familias.
La actividad que desarrolla Mercedes es la crianza y venta de animales, por la zona de Pacora.Cuenta con experiencia en el negocio, vende especialmente ganado caprino y ganado porcino. Es ayudado por su esposa, quien también percibe ingresos por agricultura ya que se dedica al jornal.
El monto del crédito solicitado es de 2000 nuevos soles, los cuales se invertirán en la compra de animales, sobre todo de ganado caprino, y también para la compra de alimentos para sus animales. Esto con la finalidad de engordarlos, tener más ganado y cotizar mejor sus productos, incrementando sus ganancias.
texts.en:
Mercedes is 58 and lives with his wife in his own home.  He has 2 children that he supports.  He lives in the area of the town of Las Juntas in the Pacora district.  They have electricity and running water in their home.  The place where he lives is a small community with approximately 200 families.

Mercedes makes a living by raising and selling animals in the Pacora area.  He has experience with this business.  In particular, he sells goats and pigs.  He is helped by his wife, who also receives agricultural income because she works as a day laborer.  The amount of the requested loan is 2,000 PEN, which he will invest in the purchase of animals, especially goats.  He will also buy feed for his animals.  This is with the goal of fattening them, of having more livestock, and of increasing the value of his products so he can increase his profits.

loans.use: to buy goats and nutritious food for them.

loans.name: Fermin

texts.es:
Fermín es un hombre de 52 años de edad, es un hombre casado y sin hijos a su cargo. Vive en casa propia con su esposa,la cual está ubicada en el Caserío San Pedrillo en el distrito de  Tambogrande. Fermín vive en la parte rural  de este distrito, pero cuenta con servicio de luz eléctrica en su domicilio.
La actividad que desarrolla Fermín es la agricultura, pues tiene 1 hectárea de terreno agrícola, en la cual tiene sembrado limón y mango, ambos en producción. El limón lo cosecha semanalmente. Además se dedica a la crianza de aves de corral. Complementariamente es peón agrícola en los fundos del caserío. Su esposa lo apoya en la crianza de las aves de corral.
El monto del crédito solicitado es de 500 nuevos soles, que serán destinados en la compra de fertilizantes y úrea para el mantenimiento de sus cultivos de limón, mejorando de esa manera su producción y la calidad de sus productos.
texts.en:
Fermín is 52 years old. He is married but has no children in his care. He lives with his wife in their own house, which is located in the village of San Pedrillo in the district of Tambogrande. Fermín lives in the rural part of this district, but he has electrical service in his house.

Fermín's work is in agriculture, since he has 1 hectare of agricultural land, on which he has planted lemons and mangoes, both of which are in production. He harvests lemons weekly. He also raises barnyard fowl. In addition, he is an agricultural worker on the village estates. His wife helps him in raising the barnyard fowl.

The amount of the loan he has applied for is 500 PEN, which will be used to buy fertilizers and urea to maintain his lemon crops, in this way improving his production and the quality of his products.

loans.use: to buy fertilizer for his crops

loans.name: Yuslin

texts.en:
Yuslin is a 34-year-old single lady. She is living with her parents. Yuslin has had a kiosk business for more than two years. It is located in front of her house. She sells daily need items such as shampoo, instant noodles, snacks, cigarettes, etc. Since Yuslin lives in a rural area, her products can be sold quickly. The profit from the business is spent on covering her family's living expenses.

For this business to contribute more to the community in the village, she was thinking of adding a greater variety of stock to her kiosk such as bath soap, detergent, shampoo, etc. This led her to seek a loan of 5,000,000 Indonesian rupiah from TLM.

loans.use: to purchase stock such as bath soap, detergent, shampoo, etc.

loans.name: Pierre

texts.fr: Pierre est marié avec sept enfants à charge. Il est spécialisé dans la vente des articles de mercerie depuis 06 ans.Il s'approvisionne dans les marchés hors du Bénin. Afin de répondre favorablement aux demandes de ses clients,il a obtenu un  concours auprès de Finadev. Une portion de son bénéfice l'aidera à payer la contribution de ses enfants et supporter les charges de la famille.
texts.en: Pierre is married and has seven children to support. He has specialized in selling sewing supplies for six years. He gets his supplies from markets outside of Benin. To respond favorably to the demands of his customers, he obtained funding from Finadev. A portion of his profits will help him to cover his part in meeting family expenses.

loans.use: to buy 20 boxes of thread, 5 dozen zippers, some stones, and buttons of different qualities

loans.name: Eduardo

texts.es:
Eduardo es un joven padre de 20 años, el cual tiene 2 pequeños, por los que se esfuerza y se dedica a trabajar diariamente un promedio de 12 horas con el fin de poder darle lo mejor a ellos y a su esposa, la cual también ha buscado la manera de poder sacar adelante a su familia, es por ello que se dedica a la venta de abarrotes en un mercado de la ciudad en donde viven, Chincha, Perú.

Eduardo siempre ha demostrado ser luchador, y es por eso que con mucha dedicación ha logrado realizar la compra de una moto taxi hace unos años, la cual es su principal fuente ingresos familiares. El piensa que le va bien en su negocio porque siempre ha demostrado respeto por los clientes a los que transporta y siempre ha mantenido los mismos precios, lo que le está permitiendo poder transportar a más clientes y mejorar sus ingresos.

Con un poco de ayuda, Eduardo podrá realizar el mantenimiento que su moto taxi necesita y es así como brindará un mejor servicio a sus clientes, lo que también le permitirá tener un mejor funcionamiento y desempeño en su labor diaria. Con este apoyo el ahora se siente capaz de lograr el éxito y cumplir su gran sueño “Tener una casa propia y sacar a sus pequeños siempre adelante”
texts.en:
Eduardo is a young father of 20 years. He has two little ones, for whom he strives and works an average of 12 hours a day with the goal of being able to give the best to them and to his wife. She has also looked for a way to be able to provide for their family, and for this reason she sell groceries in a market in the city where they live, Chincha, Perú.

Eduardo has always shown that he is a fighter, and it is for this reason that with great dedication, he succeeded a few years ago in completing the purchase of a motorcycle taxi, which is his family's principal source of income. He feels that his business is going well because he has always shown respect for the customers whom he transports and he has always maintained the same prices, which permits him to transport more customers and improve his income.

With a little help, Eduardo will be able to complete the maintenance that his motorcycle taxi needs and thus he will offer better service to his customers, which will also allow him to have better operation and performance in his daily work. With this support he now feels able to succeed and accomplish his great dream: "to have his own house and to always provide for his little ones."

loans.use: to maintain his moto taxi

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy planks (wooden formwork) to rent out

loans.name: Wangninan 5 Group

texts.fr: Le groupe WANGNINAN 5 est composé de trois personnes qui sont des amies et qui vivent dans le même quartier. La représentante du groupe, du nom de Minan est celle qui a la main levée sur la photo. Minan est âgée de 54 ans et vit au Benin. Minan n’a pas fréquenté l’école. Minan est mariée à un maçon du nom de Albert. Le couple a trois enfants dont seulement un est à leur charge. Certains enfants sont scolarisés. Minan vit avec ses enfants et son mari. Les charges familiales sont supportées à la fois par Minan et son mari. Afin de subvenir aux besoins de la famille, Minan vend depuis vingt ans du riz accompagnée de sauce dans sa région. Minan s’approvisionne dans un marché du Benin. Dans la quête de la satisfaction de sa clientèle et pour accroître son chiffre d’affaires et son revenu, Minan sollicite ensemble avec les autres membres du groupe WANGNINAN 5, un cinquième crédit auprès de ALIDé. Les prêts reçus antérieurement ont été bien remboursés.
texts.en:
The group "WANGNINAN 5" comprises three persons who are friends living in the same district. The group's representative, Minan, is the one in the photo with her hand raised. She is 54 years old and lives in Benin. Minan did not attend school. She is married to a mason named Albert. They have three children, of whom only one is in their care. Some of the children have had schooling. Minan lives with her children and husband. Family expenses are covered by both Minan and her husband.

To meet the needs of the family, Minan has been selling rice served with sauce for twenty years in her region. She gets her supplies from a market in Benin. 

Seeking to satisfy her customers and to increase her sales and her revenues, Minan, along with the other members of the group WANGNINAN 5, is requesting a fifth loan from ALIDé. The previously received loans were indeed paid back.

loans.use: to buy sacks of rice, some vegetable oil, and sauce condiments

loans.name: Mar

texts.fr:
Monsieur Mar est un homme de 57 ans qui s’active dans le commerce depuis 10 ans. Il  vend des pièces détachées à la gare routière.
Monsieur Mar est marié et père de famille. Il loue une maison pour lui et sa famille, ce qui est une charge qui peut être diminué puisqu’il possède une maison en construction. C’est pour  remédier à cette dépense, qu’il décide de faire appel à l’IMCEC pour au moins daller 2 chambres et pouvoir déménager en attendant. 
Tous les efforts qu’il fait sont concentrés à la construction afin de procurer un bien être et un confort à son foyer.
texts.en:
Mr. Mar is a 57-year-old man who has been active in commerce for ten years. He sells spare parts at the bus station. Mr. Mar is a married father with a family. He rents a house for him and his family. This is an expense that can be reduced, since he owns a house under construction. 

To remediate this expense, he decided to call upon the microfinance institution IMCEC to pave at least two rooms and to move meanwhile. All of his efforts are concentrated on the construction work in order to procure some well-being and comfort for his household.

loans.use: to do construction work on his residential plot of land

loans.name: Miriam

texts.es: Miriam de oficio comerciante en el negocio de restaurante es originaria de León, de 58 años de edad, soltera, madre de 7 hijos de los cuales 2 están a su cargo ya que los demás tienen vida independiente. Inicio su actividad a los 32 años de edad, es apoyada por  su hija atendiendo a los clientes que visitan el lugar, donde se ofrece el menú de las diferentes comidas y variadas bebidas que tendrán en el día, su expectativa es mejorar la infraestructura del negocio para una mejor presentación. Realiza el crédito para abastecer el negocio con la compra de gaseosas, jugos, carne, plátanos, pollo, arroz asi como todos los insumos  necesarios para mantener el negocio. Este préstamo ayudara ya que podrá mejorar las condiciones del negocio para dar una mejor presentación con el objetivo de  mejorar  la atención de los clientes ya que se acerca la temporada de mejores ventas  en la comunidad donde podrá obtener mas ingresos, como planes futuros espera poder agrandar el negocio asi como prestar el servicio de tour en el mar.
texts.en:
Miriam, 58, is by trade a storekeeper in the restaurant business.  She is from León and is the single mother of seven children, of whom two are still in her care and the others live independently.
